The prices that she offers are very affordable and this is the main 'bait' that she uses on her food stall to attract customers.
Rosa has been in this business for five years and what she most enjoys about her work is cooking and knowing that her customers are appreciative of her work. However, Rosa finds it hard to manage alone and sometimes she has found it difficult to serve all her customers. Her greatest wish is to develop her business. In order to achieve this, she must work very hard. For this reason, she hopes that you will help her with a small loan.
This is Rosa's second loan from MFP and, as was the case with her first loan, she is ready to make all her repayments on time. She is a very well-liked member of her community bank who is respected for the responsibility that she displays. Rosa will use the 800 Peruvian soles that she has requested to buy more tables and chairs in order to improve her service.

loan.use: to buy tables and chairs

loan.name: Josefina Isabel

texts.es: Josefina vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en las edades de 15 y 20 aos en el municipio de Malambo a 15 minutos de la ciudad de Barranquilla; all tiene 2 negocios que combina perfectamente: Una miscelnea donde vende calzado, ropa, accesorios, cosmticos etc. y el otro es un restaurante donde vende sopas y comidas corrientes . Su negocio lo inici con el apoyo de su esposo quien le compr una vitrina y mercanca variada; Josefina con su disciplina de trabajo y buena percepcin del M., empez a multiplicar sus utilidades y logr ampliarlo y adicion la venta diaria de sopas por porciones y de all le surgieron contratos para venderle almuerzos a los empleados de empresas y dems adicion la venta de artculos varios mediante guas especializadas o catlogo. Desde hace dos aos se vincul a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo y ha recibido dos financiamiento; con el primero pudo adicionarle una vitrina a su negocio y surtirla y con su segundo compr implementos de cocina y sillas para mejorar las condiciones de su restaurante. Con su credikiva comprara vveres en mayor volumen para obtener descuentos y csmticos, ropa y calzado mercancias que tiene encargada por sus clientes, con motivos de la celebracin del dia del padre que ya se acerca. Su meta es continuar organizando su negocio para aumentar sus ventas y tener mayor capital de trabajo con que responderle oportunamente a sus clientes. Su mayor desafo es lograr la educacin universitaria de su hijo, pero trabajando con disciplina todos lograrn mayor bienestar cada da y ese es su gran sueo.
texts.en:
Josefina lives with her husband and two children, who are 15 and 20 years old, in the municipality of Malamba, 15 minutes from the city of Barranquilla. She has two businesses that are the perfect combination. One is a variety store where she sells shoes, clothing, accessories, cosmetics, etc. The other is a restaurant where she sells soups and typical dishes. She started her businesses with the help of her husband, who bought her a showcase and a variety of merchandise. With her work discipline and her good sense of the market, Josefina started to multiply her profits and was able to grow her business. She added the daily sale of soup portions and from there she arranged contracts to sell lunches to the employees of certain businesses. She also started to sell certain specialized items by catalog.
She connected with Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo two years ago and has received two previous loans. With the first, she was able to add another display and stock it, and with her second loan, she bought cooking utensils and chairs to improve her restaurant. She will use this "credikiva" to buy ingredients in larger volume so that she can get a discount, and will also buy cosmetics, clothing, shoes, and other merchandise that her clients want for the upcoming Father's Day holiday.
Her goal is to continue organizing her business, to increase her sales, and to have more working capital to allow her to respond promptly to her customers. Her greatest wish is for her son to earn a university education. Working with discipline, they will all improve their well-being each day, and this is her greatest dream.

loan.use: to buy ingredients wholesale and to buy cosmetics, clothing, shoes, and other merchandise that her clients demand

loan.name: Graciela

texts.es: Graciela es socia del Banco Comunal 3 de Mayo ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 31 aos de edad, est casada y tiene 3 hijos. Estudi solo hasta 2do de educacin secundaria. Desde hace ocho aos trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer prstamo fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirti en su negocio de panadera. Con ste nuevo prstamo por la suma de S/. 2700.00 nuevo soles, comprar siete quintales de harina, manteca, azcar, levadura, sal, cuenta que por da utiliza un quintal de harina y los das de feria utiliza tres quintales de harina. Graciela trabaja junto con su esposo quien tambin trabaja en servicio de mototaxi y maestro albail, son trabajos eventuales que le permite cubrir otros gastos familiares. Su sueo es tener una amasadora para seguir trabajando en el negocio. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones y las charlas.
texts.en:
Graciela is a member of the 3 de Mayo (May 3) communal bank located in Ilave District, El Collao Province, Puno Department. She is 31 years old, married and has three children. She only finished 8th grade.
Shes been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for the last 8 years. Her first loan was for 300 new soles that she invested in her bakery.
She will use this new 2700 new sol loan to buy seven quintals of flour, lard, sugar, yeast and salt. She tells us that she uses one quintal of flour per day and on holidays she uses three quintals of flour.
Graciela works alongside her husband who also works providing mototaxi service and is a master bricklayer. Those are occasional jobs that allow him to cover other family expenses.
Her dream is to have a kneader to continue working in the bakery. What she likes about the communal bank is the meetings and the talks.

loan.use: to buy seven quintals of flour, lard, sugar, yeast and salt.

loan.name: Hilda

texts.es: Hilda es socia del Banco Comunal 3 de Mayo ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 25 aos de edad, es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo. Hilda estudi educacin secundaria. La seora se dedica a la compra y venta de granos de la regin como: papa, chuo y carnes, trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace seis aos, su prstamo anterior de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles lo invirti en su negocio. Con ste nuevo prstamo de S/. 2500.00 nuevos soles comprar tres sacos de chuo, dos sacos de papa, dos sacos de quinua y carnes, nos cuenta que todos sus productos los compra de las ferias de Puno y Juliaca y los vende en la ciudad de Arequipa. En el negocio le ayuda su hermano y su esposo quien a su vez realiza servicio en mototaxi (transportista). Su sueo es tener ms capital y que el negocio crezca para viajar a Lima y Tacna. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones porque las socias son divertidas.
texts.en: Hilda is a member of the "3 de Mayo" ("May 3rd") Communal Bank, located in the Llave district, El Collao province, department of Puno. She is 25 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has one son. Hilda has a secondary school education. She works buying and selling regional grains like potato and chuo [traditional Peruvian freeze-dried potatoes], as well as meat. Hilda has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for six years. She used her last loan of 300 nuevos soles to invest in her business. With this new loan of 2,500 nuevos soles, she will buy three sacks of chuo, two sacks of potatoes, two sacks of quinoa, and meat. Hilda says that she buys all of her products at the markets of Puno and Juliaca and sells them in the city of Arequipa. She gets help with the business from her brother and from her husband, who also runs a motorcycle-taxi. Her dream is to have more capital and for her business to grow enough that she can travel to Lima and Tacna. Hilda's favorite thing about her communal bank is the meetings, because her fellow members are fun.

loan.use: to buy three sacks of chuo, two sacks of potatoes, two sacks of quinoa, and meat

loan.name: Luz Teodora

texts.es: La Sra. Luz de 46 aos de edad vive con su esposo e hijos. Tiene casa propia la cual se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de Pachacutec. La Sra. es propietaria de 2 vehculos station wagon. Adems trabaja como obrera de campo en el fundo Agrcola Chapi junto a su esposo. Ella alquila sus vehculos teniendo un ingreso diario. Requiere el crdito para hacerle un mantenimiento general a uno de los vehiculos. La Sra. Luz es una persona muy emprendedora que a logrado adquirir sus vehculos gracias a su trabajo. Ella est muy agradecida por el apoyo que le podamos dar a trvez de este financiamiento
texts.en: Mrs. Luz is 46 years old and lives with her husband and children. She has her own home that is located in the Pachacutec district. She is the owner of 2 station wagon vehicles and also works as a farm hand in the Agrcola Chapi farm with her husband. Mrs. Luz rents out her vehicles and gets a daily income out of them. She needs the loan to do general maintenance to one of her vehicles. Mrs. Luz is a very enterprising person that has been able to get her vehicles thanks to her work. She is very grateful for the support that we are able to give to her through this loan.

loan.use: make repairs to her car.

loan.name: Irma

texts.es: Irma es socia del Banco Comunal 3 de Mayo ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 26 aos de edad, es conviviente y no tiene hijos. Estudio educacin superior. Irma trabaja recientemente con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, solicitar un prstamo por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, con el que comprar telas, hilos, agujas, adems aumentar a su capital para comprar una mquina industrial para la confeccin de buzos y camisetas, mayormente atiende pedidos. Ella recibe la ayuda de su pareja. Su sueo es formar una empresa en la ciudad de Arequipa. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del prstamo.
texts.en:
Irma is a member of the 3 de Mayo (May 3) communal bank located in Ilave District, El Collao Province and Puno Department. She is 26 years old, has a spouse but no children. She studied higher education.
Irma started working with the Manuela Ramos Movement recently . She will ask for a 500 new sol loan to buy fabric, thread and needles and will increase her capital to buy an industrial sewing machine to make sweatshirts and t-shirts. For the most part, she works based on prior orders. Her spouse helps her.
Her dream is to establish a firm in the city of Arequipa. What she likes about the communal bank is the ease of the loan.

loan.use: to buy fabric, thread, needles and a sewing machine.

loan.name: Paula Antonia

texts.es: La seora Paula Antonia de la ciudad de Managua es una persona responsable que quiere un mejor nivel de vida para su familia y as salir adelante para el futuro de sus hijos y que sean profesionales y ser unos excelentes trabajadores. En esta oficina de Ceprodel se present la seora anteriormente mencionada a solicitar crdito para mejorar su vivienda que se encuentra en mal estado, este crdito lo invertir en compra de materiales de construccin como arena, cemento, bloques, hierro, piedrn y pagar mano de obra , para levantar pared de hogar.
texts.en:
Paula Antonia is from the city of Managua. She is a responsible person who wants to improve her familys standard of living and get ahead for her childrens future and that they become professionals and excellent workers.
The aforementioned woman came into Ceprodels office to request a loan to do some improvements to her home which is in poor state. She will use the loan to buy building materials and supplies like sand, cement, concrete blocks, iron rods and gravel and to pay labor costs to erect a wall.

loan.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loan.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana es socia del Banco Comunal 3 de Mayo ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 55 aos de edad, es madre soltera y tiene dos hijos independientes. Estudi hasta 3ro de educacin primaria. Juana es una socia nueva que recientemente ingres al Movimiento Manuela Ramos, solicitar un prstamo por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertir en la compra de quesos, dos sacos de harinas, azcar, aceite, para su negocio, ella se dedica a la venta de picarones (dulce peruano). Cuenta que todos los das vende en el mercado de Ilave en un triciclo de forma ambulatoria. Su sueo es seguir trabajando en el negocio y generar ms ganancias.. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del prstamo.
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the 3 de Mayo (May 3) communal bank located in Ilave District, El Collao Province and Puno Department. She is 55 years old and the single mother of two independent children. She completed third grade.
Juana is a new client who recently joined the Manuela Ramos Movement. She will ask for a 500 new sol loan to buy cheese, two sacks of flour, sugar and oil for her business. She sells picarones (Peruvian sweet). She relates that she sells every day in the Ilave market as a peddler using a three-wheeled cart. Her dream is to stay in business and generate more profits. What she likes about the communal bank is the ease of the loan.

loan.use: to buy cheese, two sacks of flour, sugar and oil.

loan.name: Imelda

texts.es: Imelda es una cliente de hace muchos aos, que trabaja con Fundacin Len 2000. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa usada, pues siempre ha demostrado ser una persona muy dedicada. Ella ofrece sus productos a diferentes clientes que le solicitan variedad. La mayora de del tiempo tiene que salir a ofrecerla, pero cierta parte lo mantiene en su vivienda en donde vecinos, amigos y familiares conocen su actividad. Este crdito es para la compra de faldas, trajes, vestidos, pantalones, camisas, shorts y otros.
texts.en: Imelda is a longstanding client working with Fundacin Len 2000. She sells used clothes and has always shown herself to be a dedicated person. She sells to various customers who request variety. Most of the time she has to go out to sell but she keeps some of her stock at home for neighbors, friends and family members who know of her activity. This loan is to buy skirts, suits, dresses, pants, shirts, shorts and others.

loan.use: to buy skirts, suits, dresses, pants, shirts, shorts and others.

loan.name: Luisa

texts.es: Luisa es socia del Banco Comunal 3 de Mayo ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 62 aos de edad, est casada y tiene siete hijos independientes, no cuenta con estudios. Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace siete aos, su prstamo anterior de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, lo invirti en su negocio de venta al por menor de carne y productos derivados, tambin vende productos de la regin. Con ste nuevo prstamo de S/. 1500.00 nuevos soles comprar cinco ovejas para su respectivo engorde, dos arrobas de papa y chuo. Nos cuenta que en el negocio la ayudan sus hijos. Su sueo es mejorar el negocio y as tener mayores ingresos. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del prstamo.
texts.en:
Luisa is a member of the 3 de Mayo (May 3) communal bank located in Ilave District, El Collao Province and Puno Department. She is 62 years old, married and has seven independent children. She never went to school.
She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for the last 7 years. Her previous loan was for 300 new soles that she used for her meat and meat byproducts retail business; she also sells regional goods.
She will use this new, 1500 new sol, loan to buy five sheep to fatten up and two arrobas (1 arroba= 12.5Kg) of potatoes and chuo (freeze dried, dehydrated potato). She tells us that her children help her with the business. Her dream is to improve the business to earn higher income. What she likes about the communal bank is the ease of loan.

loan.use: to buy five sheep to fatten up and two arrobas of potato and chuo.

loan.name: Julio Ronald

texts.es:
Julio tiene 30 aos vive con su esposa e hijo en casa de su madre en el distrito Pacanga ubicado en la provincia de Chepn La Libertad. La vida es tranquila en la pequea comunidad donde Julio vive.
Desde hace 6 aos Julio se dedica a la venta de carne en el mercado de su comunidad y este negocio le ha trado satisfacciones a l y a su familia. Es por ello que Julio desea invertir en el.
l ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar carne adecuada para su comercializacin. Julio sabe que esta inversin le ser de gran ayuda en sus ventas y con ello podr mejorar su economa y calidad de vida. Otra parte del crdito ser destinada a adquirir bienes de uso personal que su familia necesita.
Julio es un hombre responsable con muchos deseos de cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
Julio tiene 30 aos vive con su esposa e hijo en casa de su madre en el distrito Pacanga ubicado en la provincia de Chepn La Libertad. La vida es tranquila en la pequea comunidad donde Julio vive.
Desde hace 6 aos Julio se dedica a la venta de carne en el mercado de su comunidad y este negocio le ha trado satisfacciones a l y a su familia. Es por ello que Julio desea invertir en el.
l ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar carne adecuada para su comercializacin. Julio sabe que esta inversin le ser de gran ayuda en sus ventas y con ello podr mejorar su economa y calidad de vida. Otra parte del crdito ser destinada a adquirir bienes de uso personal que su familia necesita.
Julio es un hombre responsable con muchos deseos de cumplir sus metas.

loan.use: Comprar carne y bienes personales.

loan.name: Olga Isabel

texts.es:
La seora Olga Isabel de la ciudad de Managua es una persona que se caracteriza por ser una responsable que quiere un mejor nivel de vida para su familia y as salir adelante para el futuro de sus hijos.
En esta oficina de Ceprodel se present a solicitar crdito la seora Olga Isabel para mejorar su vivienda que se encuentra en mal estado, este crdito lo invertir en compra de materiales de construccin como arena, cemento, bloques, hierro, piedrn y pagar mano de obra, para hacer anexo de cuarto.
texts.en:
Olga Isabel is from the city of Managua. She is noted as being a responsible person who would like to achieve a better standard of living for her family and thereby get ahead for the future of her children.
Olga Isabel came to this Ceprodel office to request a loan to improve her home which is in a bad state of repair. She will invest this loan in buying construction supplies such as sand, cement, blocks, iron and gravel, and paying labor costs, to have an extension built on a room.

loan.use: to improve her home

loan.name: Eva

texts.es: Eva, de 37 aos, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Jos de 40 aos y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. La vida de Eva no fue muy sencilla, desde muy pequea siempre se preocup por ayudar con los gastos de su casa. Actualmente tiene un negocio, que es la venta de ropa, y lo realiza en la calle, aunque es muy informal su trabajo, an as la gente la conocen y le hacen pedidos de alguna prenda que requiera, como casacas, chompas, pantalones, pues se encuentran en un lugar que ahora baja la temperatura. Lleva 4 aos en esta actividad y lo que ms le gusta es conversar con sus clientes, pero ahora su mayor prioridad es aumentar la mercadera que tiene, sin embargo para lograr vender, tiene que caminar largo trechos para buscar clientes. Pero ella esta dispuesta a cualquier sacrificio con tal de alcanzar sus metas. Por tal motivo pide un pequeo apoyo de parte de ustedes para que pueda invertir en su negocio. Este es el segundo crdito con MFP y esta decidida a pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, as como hizo con sus anteriores prstamos, en su banco comunal es una socia muy querida y respetada por sus socias. Con los ochocientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprar ms ropa para aumentar la cantidad de mercadera que tiene.
texts.en:
Eva, 37, is an unassuming, hard working woman living in her own house with her husband, Jos, 40, and their three cherished children for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life. Evas life hasnt been easy. From a very young age shes taken on the responsibility of helping pay household expenses.
She currently has a business selling clothes in the street. Although her work is informal even so she is known by the people and they place orders for whatever article of clothing they need like jackets, sweaters and pants because they are located in a place where the temperature drops now. Shes been in this line of work for four years and what she likes best about it is chatting with her customers. But now, her greatest priority is increasing the merchandise she has. However, in order to sell she has to cover long distances to seek out customers. But shes willing to face whatever sacrifice is necessary in order to reach her goals. Because of this, shes asking for a small loan from you to invest in her business.
This is her second loan with MFP and shes determined to pay her installments on time like she did with her previous loans. She is a very well liked and respected member of her communal bank. She will buy clothes to increase the amount of merchandise she has.

loan.use: to buy more clothes.

loan.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: Luz Marina es socia del Banco Comunal 3 de Mayo ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 18 aos de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos. Tiene estudios de educacin secundaria. Desde hace un ciclo trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer prstamo solicitado de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles lo invirti en su negocio de venta de prendas de vestir (ropa de bebes, medias, etc). Con ste nuevo prstamo de S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles comprar casacas, medias y chompas, nos cuenta que la mercadera la trae de Tacna, Moquegua y Desaguadero y la vende en la localidad de Ilave. La seora trabaja sola en el negocio. Su sueo es tener una tienda bien surtida y grande para exhibir toda su mercadera. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las ganancias del ahorro.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is a member of the "3 de Mayo" community bank which is located in Ilave district, in El Collao province, in Puno department. She is 18 years old, single, and doesn't have any children. She has a high school level of education.
Luz Marina has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for one loan cycle. Her first loan was for 500 Peruvian soles and she invested that money in her business selling clothes (baby clothes, pantyhose, etc.)
Luz Marina will use this new loan for 1,000 soles to buy jackets, pantyhose (tights) and sweaters. She tells us that she buys her merchandise in Tacna, Moquegua and Desaguadero and sells it in the town of Ilave. She works alone in her business.
Luz Marina's dream is to own a large, well-stocked store where she can display all her merchandise. What she likes about her community bank is the money that she makes on her savings.

loan.use: to buy jackets, pantyhose (tights) and sweaters

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy irons, blenders, cell phones and USB memory sticks

loan.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Csar es un joven emprendedor de 23 aos de edad que vive en casa de sus padres en una comunidad rural del distrito de Tambogrande- Piura. Csar tiene una excelente relacin con sus padres ya que estos siempre le han brindado su apoyo.
Csar se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino y vacuno. Adems cuenta con terreno agrcola (que su padre le hered) en el cual siembra limn semanalmente y actualmente se encuentra en produccin. Csar tambin ayuda a su madre en las labores agrcolas que esta desarrolla. Existe un apoyo mutuo que ayuda a que el negocio familiar se desarrolle.
Csar solicita un crdito de 2500 nuevos soles, a Edpyme Alternativa, para comprar fertilizantes para el cultivo de limn y realizar labores de deshierbo. As mismo, Csar, comprar alimento balanceado para el engorde de sus ovinos y vacunos.
Este crdito le ser de suma utilidad a Csar, pues sus negocios se vern beneficiado ya que l podr vender sus productos a mejores precios.
Csar es un joven trabajador que goza de buenas referencias personales.
texts.en:
Csar is a young, 23-year-old entrepreneur living in his parents house in a rural community in Tambogrande-Piura District. Csar has an excellent relationship with his parents since they have always supported him.
Csar raises sheep and cattle. Besides, he has a tract of farmland that his father passed on to him where he currently grows lemons that he harvests weekly. Csar also helps his mother with the farming chores she carries out. There is mutual assistance among them that helps the family business progress.
Csar is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 2500 new sol loan to buy fertilizer for the lemon crop and to do weeding. At the same time, Csar will buy balanced feed for his sheep and cattle.
This loan will be of the utmost use for Csar because his businesses will benefit when he is able to sell his products for better prices.
Csar is a hard working young man who has good personal references.

loan.use: to buy fertilizers, to do the weeding and to buy animal feed.

loan.name: Marcia

texts.es: Marcia tiene su negocio que es la compra y venta de ganado. Ha demostrado ser una mujer emprendedora y que ha sabido administrar su actividad. Tiene ms de 23 aos en este negocio, sus inicios se deben con el apoyo de sus padres que le ensearon a este tipo de negocio para ella pudiera mantener a su familia ya que tiene 3 hijos pero solamente 2 estn bajo su cargo. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de vacas, toros, terneros y necesita alimentos para poder engordarlos.
texts.en: Marcia's business is buying and selling cattle. She has shown herself to be an entrepreneurial woman who has known how to run her own business. She has been in the business for more than 23 years. She started out thanks to the support of her parents who taught her this business so that she could support her family. Marcia has three children but only two of them are in her care. She will use her loan to buy cows, bulls and calves, and the feed she needs to fatten them.

loan.use: to buy cows, bulls, calves and the feed she needs to fatten them

loan.name: Boni Alex

texts.es:
Alex es un joven alegre y trabajador de 27 aos de edad. l es padre soltero de 2 nios y vive en casa de sus padres en el distrito de Jos Leonardo Ortiz en Chiclayo. Esta es una comunidad urbana en vas de desarrollo.
Alex labora en uno de los hoteles ms prestigiosos de la ciudad de Chiclayo y se encuentra en el rea de mantenimiento. Alex trabaja para este hotel hace varios aos y por ello cuenta con estabilidad laboral. l se siente contento y satisfecho con este trabajo que le ha permitido darle comodidades a sus hijos.
Alex solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo de 700 nuevos soles para arreglar su casa y para otros gastos personales. l es un cliente recurrente de nuestra institucin y cancela sus crditos puntualmente. Adems, goza de buenas referencias personales y laborales.
texts.en:
Alex es un joven alegre y trabajador de 27 aos de edad. l es padre soltero de 2 nios y vive en casa de sus padres en el distrito de Jos Leonardo Ortiz en Chiclayo. Esta es una comunidad urbana en vas de desarrollo.
Alex labora en uno de los hoteles ms prestigiosos de la ciudad de Chiclayo y se encuentra en el rea de mantenimiento. Alex trabaja para este hotel hace varios aos y por ello cuenta con estabilidad laboral. l se siente contento y satisfecho con este trabajo que le ha permitido darle comodidades a sus hijos.
Alex solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo de 700 nuevos soles para arreglar su casa y para otros gastos personales. l es un cliente recurrente de nuestra institucin y cancela sus crditos puntualmente. Adems, goza de buenas referencias personales y laborales.

loan.use: Reparar interior de vivienda y usos personales.

loan.name: Chicas Dulces Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Chicas Dulces y se ubica en el Estado de Puebla. El grupo esta conformado por 9 integrantes y es la quinta vez que solicitan un prestamo. Martha es la presidenta del grupo. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa interior que inicio hace 3 aos. Solicita el prestamo para comprar ropa interior. Ella tiene 44 aos, estudio hasta 4to ao de primaria, ella vive en union libre y tiene en total 3 hijos. Al momento de solicitar este prestamo se siente entusiasmada por la oportunidad que le brindan de invertir en su negocio y tener mayor mercancia para su venta. Quiere este credito para comprar mercancia que ya tiene comprometida y con esto tener mas clientes y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia. Tambin quiere ahorrar un parte de sus ganancias para brindarles educacin a sus hijos, ya que su mayor sueo es ver a sus hijos con una carrera profesional.
texts.en:
This group is called 'Chicas Dulces' (Sweet Girls) and is located in the State of Puebla. The group has nine members and this is the fifth time that they have requested a loan.
Martha is the group's president. She has a business selling underwear which she started three years ago. She is requesting this loan to buy underwear. Martha is 44 years old and studied up to the fourth year of elementary school. She has a common-law marriage and three children. At the time of requesting this loan, she feels excited by the opportunity that she is being given to invest in her business and have more merchandise to sell. She would like this loan to buy merchandise that she has already promised to customers. She thereby hopes to gain more customers and provide her family with a better quality of life. She would also like to save part of her profits so that she can provide for her children's education since her biggest dream is to see her children gain professional degrees.

loan.use: to buy underwear for her business

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase clothing.

loan.name: Francisca Genoveva

texts.es:
Francisca tiene 58 aos D. edad, ella vive con su esposo y su menor hijo en casa propia en el distrito D. Chiclayo, en una comunidad urbana que cuenta con los servicios bsicos.
Francisca se dedica a la venta D. abarrotes, golosinas, bebidas y productos D. higiene personal en un local D. su propiedad. Francisca tiene 6 aos vendiendo estos productos en su surtida bodega y este negocio le ha trado buenos ingresos y satisfacciones. Por ello desea seguir invirtiendo en el.
Francisca solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito D. 2000 nuevos soles para comprar productos que han mostrado demanda y con los que ella, actualmente, no cuenta. Esta inversin le permitir aumentar su capital D. trabajo y por lo tanto sus ventas.
Francisca es una cliente recurrente D. nuestra entidad y goza D. buenas referencias personales, laborales y crediticias pues ha cancelado puntual y responsablemente los crditos que se le han brindado.
Ella estara sumamente agradecida D. concedrsele el prstamo pues le ayudara a crecer en su actividad.
texts.en:
Francisca is 58 years old and lives with her husband and their young son in their own home in the district of Chiclayo, in an urban community that has basic utilities.
Francisca works selling groceries, snacks, beverages, and personal hygiene products in a store on her property. She has sold these products for six years from her stocked store, and this business has maD. her a good income and satisfaction, so she wants to continue investing in it.
Francisca has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles to purchase products that are in demand and that she does not currently have. This investment will allow her to increase her working capital and her sales.
Francisca is a recurring client at our bank, and has good personal, work, and credit reference, and has maD. all of her payments on time and responsibly for the past loans she has been given.
She would be very thankful to receive this loan because it would help her grow her business.

loan.use: to purchase merchandise.

loan.name: Magdalena

texts.es: Magdalena es socia del Banco Comunal 3 de Mayo ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 42 aos de edad, est casada y tiene 5 hijos. Estudi educacin secundaria. La seora se dedica a la venta de artculos artesanales como bordados, dice que sus productos los vende en Ilave y Juli. Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace cinco aos, su primer prstamo de S/. 200.00 nuevos soles, lo invirti en su negocio venta de artesanas. Con este prstamo de S/. 600.00 nuevos soles, comprar dos kilos de lanas, veinte cojines de colores, bayeta (tela)y otros materiales. Magdalena trabaja sola en el negocio ya que su esposo trabaja en albail. Su sueo es tener una casa propia y grande para vivir feliz. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del prstamo y lo que gana el ahorro.
texts.en:
Magdalena is a member of the "3 de Mayo" community bank which is located in Ilave district, in El Collao province, in Puno department. She is 42 years old, married, and has five children. She has a high school level of education.
Magdalena sells handicrafts such as embroidered items. She says that she sells her products in Ilave and Juli. She has been working with Movimiento Manuela Ramos for five years. Her first loan was for 200 Peruvian soles and she invested that money in her handicrafts business.
Magdalena will use this loan for 600 soles to buy two kilos of yarn, twenty colored cushions, felt and other materials. Magdalena works alone in her business as her husband is a construction worker. Her dream is to own her own home (a large one) so that she can live happily. What she most likes about her community bank is the ease of the loans and what she gains on her savings.

loan.use: to buy two kilos of yarn, twenty colored cushions, felt and other materials

loan.name: Rocio

texts.es: Roco tiene 49 aos, es una mujer muy amable y sencilla, vive en su casa propia junto a su querida hija Cledy de 17 aos y lo que ms desea es mejorar su calidad de vida. En un parque muy transitado de la ciudad de Pucallpa, Roco tiene su puesto de golosinas, su negocio es muy concurrido por los nios, ya que siempre tiene cosas muy deliciosas para vender, adems que tiene mucha paciencia para atender, motivo por el cual casi siempre termina por vender toda su mercadera. Lleva 2 aos trabajando en su negocio, y considera que esta trabajo es flexible en los horarios, as no deja de atender a su hija. Sin embargo el tener que permanecer todo el da parada afecta su salud, pero debe hacerlo para poder ganar ms dinero. Espera con el tiempo tener capital para invertir en una tienda de abarrotes, por ello pide de su colaboracin para cumplir su anhelo. Este ser el quinto crdito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo y esta depuesta a hacerlo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy querida y respetada, ya que siempre es muy puntual en sus reuniones. Con los seiscientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprar ms golosinas para implementar mejor su kiosco y as ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad.
texts.en:
Roco is 49 years old. She is a very kind and simple woman who lives in her own home together with her beloved daughter, 17 year-old Cledy. What she wants more than anything is to improve her quality of life.
Roco has a candy stall in a very busy park in the city of Pucallpa. Her business is very popular with children since she always has delicious things to sell. In addition, she also has a lot of patience when serving her customers. This means that she nearly always ends up selling all her merchandise. Roco has been working in her business for two years and, because her work has flexible hours, she is also able to look after her daughter. The fact that she has to remain standing all day long affects her health but she must do so, so that she can earn more money. Over time, Roco hopes to have capital to invest in a grocery store. She is requesting your cooperation in helping her to achieve her goal.
This will be Roco's fifth loan from MFP. She knows that she has to make all her repayments on time and is prepared to do so. She is a very well-liked and well-respected member of her community bank as she is always very punctual for meetings. She will use the 600 Peruvian soles that she has requested to buy more candies with which to better stock her kiosk so that she can offer her customers a wider variety of products.

loan.use: to buy a variety of candies to stock her kiosk

loan.name: Oneida

texts.es: Oneida de 47 aos es una mujer casada que vive en el municipio de Soledad, con su esposo y sus dos hijos en las edades de 19 y 22 aos. Desde hace 12 aos una amiga le propuso dedicarse al comercio mediante guas especializadas de productos, y ella empez a vender interiores y cosmticos principalmente; inici con 6 clientes y gradualmente mediante referidos, fue ampliando su mercado as como diversificando sus productos, pues accedi a nuevos catlogos, con los que le ha ido tan bien, que desde hace 7 aos lidera un equipo de comerciantes. Oneida tiene muchos sueos y es una mujer muy trabajadora, por eso ahora est empeada en adquirir una casa de mayor tamao, porque la que tiene es muy pequea para sus expectativas de bienestar. Su mayor desafo ocurri cuando por inexperiencia en la seleccin de su clientela, perdi dinero porque otorgaba crditos sin previa seleccin de sus clientes. Su credikiva es el sptimo financiamiento con el cual comprar perfumes, cremas, jabones lquidos, productos para el hogar, suteres, tintes, labiales ropa interior, que tiene encargado por sus rentables clientes. Con sus financiamientos anteriores ha logrado incrementar su capital de trabajo y responder oportunamente a sus principales clientes, que son sus compradores permanentes y le han ayudado a sostenerse en el mercado.
texts.en: Oneida is 47 years old. She is a married woman who lives in Soledad with her husband and two children, aged 19 and 22. 12 years ago, a friend proposed to her that she open a business with via specialized product guides. She began to sell mainly underwear and cosmetics. She began with 6 customers and gradually, with referrals, she widened her market and diversified her products by accessing new catalogs. It has gone very well for her and for 7 years, she has been a leader of a group of merchants. Oneida has a lot of dreams and she is a very hardworking woman. That is why she is now striving to acquire a larger house, becasue the one she has is too small for her expectations of wellbeing. Her greatest challenge occurred when, due to a lack of experience for choosing clientele, she lost moeny because she gave credit without screening her custoemrs first. Her Kiva loan is her seventh loan and with it she will buy perfume, cream, liquid soap, household products, sweaters, dyes, lipstick, underwear- all on order from her profitale customers. With her previous loans, she has been able to increase her working capital and reposnd quickly to her main customers. They are her permanent buyers and have helped her sustain herself in the market.

loan.use: to buy perfume, cosmetics, items for the home, and underwear.

loan.name: Ricardina

texts.es: Ricardina es socia del Banco Comunal 3 de Mayo ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 31 aos de edad, est casada y tiene 2 hijos. Estudi educacin primaria. Ricardina es una socia nueva que recientemente se incorpora a trabajar con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, solicita un prstamo de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertir en su negocio venta de zapatos, comprar veinte pares de zapatos. Nos cuenta que realiza sus compras en Oruro (Bolivia) y los vende en la ciudad de Puno, todos los jueves. Trabaja sola en el negocio ya que su esposo trabaja en una empresa de transportes como chofer. Su sueo es tener un terreno donde pueda construir su casa.. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es lo que ganan sus ahorros.
texts.en:
Ricardina is a member of the communal bank "3 de Mayo," which is located in the Llave district of El Collao province in the department of Puno. She is 31 years old, married, and has 2 children. She has an elementary school education.
Ricardina is a new member who recently started working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos organization. She is requesting a loan of 500 Peruvian soles to invest in her business selling shoes. With the proceeds of the loan she will buy 20 pairs of shoes. She tells us that she makes her purchases in Oruro (Bolivia) and sells her merchandise in the city of Puno on Thursdays.
Ricardina works alone in her business, since her husband works as a driver for a transportation company.
Her dream is to have land where she could build a house.
What she likes about the communal bank is the interest she earns on her savings.

loan.use: to buy 20 pairs of shoes

loan.name: Eloy

texts.en:
Eloy is married with three children, two in college and one in high school. He has had a small grain business for the last ten years, the skills for which he learned working on farms in his earlier years. Eloy works long hours each day selling his basic grains in an effort to provide a better life for his family. His dream is to make enough money to be able to finish construction on the rooms in his house.
The loan will assist Eloy buy more basic grain products that he will then be able to sell to his willing buyers.

loan.use: to buy more basic grain products.

loan.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha es socia del Banco Comunal Las Trenzas de Oro ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 31 aos de edad, est casada y tiene 3 hijos. Martha cuenta con educacin secundaria. Desde hace un ao que trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer prstamo fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirti en su negocio de compra y venta de animales menores. Nos cuenta que tambin se dedica a la venta de tejidos como: mantas, chompas, chalecos y combustible. Con ste nuevo prstamo de S/. 800.00 nuevos soles, aumentar al capital de su negocio y comprar tres paquetes de lana, dos cilindros de combustibles (petrleo y gasolina). En el negocio trabaja sola ya que su esposo realiza servicio de mototaxi. Su sueo es crecer ms en el negocio y tener una casa bonita. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las reuniones y cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en:
Martha is a member of the communal bank "Trenzas de Oro," located in the Llave district of El Collao province in the department of Puno. She is 31 years old, married, and has 3 children. Martha has a middle school education.
Martha has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos organization for a year. Her first loan was for 500 Peruvian soles, which she invested in her business buying and selling small animals. She tells us that she also has a business selling knitted items such as blankets, sweaters, vests, and that she also sells fuel.
With this new loan of 800 Peruvian soles, she will increase the working capital in her business and buy three packages of wool and two cylinders of fuel (petroleum and gasoline.) She works alone in her business, since her husband works as a moto- taxi driver.
Her dream is to have her business grow and to have a pretty house.
What she likes most about the communal bank are the meetings and making her payments.

loan.use: to buy three packages of wool and two cylinders of fuel (oil and gas)

loan.name: Edgar

texts.es: Edgar, de 27 aos, es un joven muy amable y trabajador, vive en una casa alquilada y est dispuesto a trabajar muy duro para mejorar su calidad de vida. Edgar pasa sus das manejando su taxi, no importa si es de da o de noche, l sigue recorriendo las calles en busca de clientes que deseen llegar a su destino. El carcter de Edgar es estar siempre de buen nimo y muy comunicativo, eso le ha dado ventaja de tener clientes fijos, favorecindole tambin en los ingresos. Otras de las ventajas que tiene es que conoce muy bien las calles de la ciudad de Pucallpa y procura siempre brindar un servicio rpido. Tiene 2 aos realizando este trabajo y desea continuar ya que su principal anhelo es comprarse otro carro, de esa manera asegurar ms ingresos. Este ser su primer crdito con MFP y esta dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas a tiempo. En su banco comunal es un socio muy responsable y solidario. Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, har arreglar su taxi, ya que tiene algunas averas.
texts.en:
Edgar, 27, is a very kind and hard working young man. He lives in a leased house and is very willing to work very hard to improve his quality of life. Edgar spends his days driving his taxi; it doesnt matter if its day or night, he continues riding around the streets looking for customers that want to reach their destination.
Edgars personality is such that hes always in a good mood and very communicative; this has led to his having the advantage of having regular customers which in turn leads to favorable income. Another advantage he has is that he knows the streets in Pucallpa very well and he always strives to provide quick service. Hes been doing this work for two years and wants to stay with it since his main wish is to buy another car to insure still more income.
This will be his first loan with MFP. He is willing to pay all his installments on time. He is a very responsible and supportive member of his communal bank. He will use the requested five-hundred new soles to service his taxi since it has a few malfunctions.

loan.use: to have his car serviced.

loan.name: Nely

texts.es: Nely es socia del Banco Comunal 3 de Mayo ubicado en el distrito Ilave, provincia El Collao y departamento de Puno, tiene 28 aos de edad, est casada y tiene 3 hjos. Nely cuenta con educacin primaria. La seora trabaja desde hace dos aos con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer prstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirti en su negocio de venta de artculos artesanales, tales como bordados. Nely solicitar un nuevo prstamo por la suma de S/. 1100.00 nuevos soles, dinero que utilizar para comprar 16 kilos de lana de diferentes colores y bayetas (tela de la regin) para sus respectivos tejidos, la seora los vende en la localidad de Ilave y trabaja sola en el negocio ya que su esposo trabaja en construccin civil . Su sueo es tener ms capital para mejorar el negocio. Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal son las ganancias del ahorro.
texts.en:
Nely is a member of the 3 de Mayo (May 3) communal bank located in Ilave District, El Collao Province and Puno Department. She is 28 years old, married and has three children. Nely completed elementary school.
She has worked with the Manuela Ramos Movement for the last two years. Her first loan was in the amount of 500 new soles that she invested in her crafts, like weaving, business.
Nely will ask for a new loan in the amount of 1100 new soles to buy 16 kilos of wool in different colors and bayetas (regional fabric) for her various weavings. She sells in Ilave and works alone since her husband works in civil construction.
Her dream is to have more capital to improve the business. What she likes about the communal bank is the earnings on savings.

loan.use: to buy 16 kilos of wool in different colors and bayetas (regional fabrics) for her respective weavings.

loan.name: Milagro Del Socorro

texts.es: Milagro Del Socorro de 47 aos, tiene su negocio que es servicio de moto taxis. Su negocio lo inicio por su hijo que con experiencia de su hijo que alquilaba moto y al ver que obtena ganancias decide empezar su negocio. En la actualidad tiene que levantarse temprano para poder brindar el servicio ya que tiene una persona que le alquila la moto taxi y se encarga de llevarle el dinero. Con el financiamiento comprara repuestos para su moto taxi, adems llantas y asientos. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere el prstamo para mejorar su negocio.
texts.en: Milagro Del Socorro, 47, has a business thats mototaxi service. She started the business thanks to her son who worked with a leased mototaxi and seeing that he earned good profits decided to start her business. She currently has to rise early to provide service since she has a person that leases the mototaxi from and she has to take the money. She will use the loan to buy spare parts for the mototaxi as well as tires and seats. She has many hopes for her business and wants the loan to improve it.

loan.use: to buy spare parts for her mototaxi and to buy tires and seats too.

loan.name: Eva Maria

texts.en:
Eva, age 30, is a grade school teacher, but she also has a cosmetics business, selling products to a wide network of friends and referrals. She has been working in both of these careers for the last two years, and hopes to save enough so that she and her husband can start a family in the near future.
This loan will assist Eva to buy more products to sell, including perfumes, which will be particularly popular gift items during the upcoming family-focused holidays.

loan.use: to buy more cosmetic products, including perfumes, to offer for sale

loan.name: Julio

texts.es: Julio es un joven de 21 aos con mucha capacidad de riesgo, desde hace 6 aos y proveniente de Valledupar en el departamento del Cesar, vino a vivir a la ciudad de Barranquilla en casa de su ta y decidi emprender su propio negocio en el que actualmente su ta lo apoya; l tiene un punto de venta cerca a un complejo comercial llamado Metrocentro, donde vende chancletas y calzado en general, sus clientes son los peatones que por all circundan de da y de noche y que l ha aprovechado muy bien para posicionarse, porque el sitio donde est ubicado es un corredor comercial de mucho movimiento, lo cual favorece sus ventas. Julio compra y vende de contado y al detal, aunque tambin tiene algunos clientes a quienes les financia sus compras, pues ellos distribuyen en otros mercados sus productos al menudeo. Aunque la competencia que rodea al negocio es alta, tambin encuentra muchas oportunidades en el mercado, porque entre todos los comerciantes se conocen y entre ellos, hay mucha cooperacin. Julio es un joven con muchos sueos entre los cuales est el tener su casa propia, por eso persiste en su labor diaria, aunque tenga el gran desafo del pequeo capital de trabajo con el que funciona. Esta es justamente la razn por la cual recurre a su credikiva, que es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo con el cual comprar calzado en mayor volumen, para ganar descuentos por la compra de contado y la cantidad, pues se est preparando, desde ahora, para el segundo semestre del ao que trae muchos festivos, vacacionales y especialmente la fiesta del da del padre que se acerca y tiene clientes que le han encargado las chancletas que regalarn a sus progenitores, a propsito de esa temporada comercail. Mientras Julio se esmera por cumplir su sueo de crecimiento personal y empresarial, continua esforzndose por incrementar la rentabilidad sobre sus ventas que en la actualidad es no menor del 32%.
texts.en:
Julio, 21, has worked for the last 6 years with a large risk capacity. He moved to Barranquilla from Valledupar, Cesar department and lives with his aunt and decided to set up his own business with her help. His store is near a commercial complex called Metrocentro where he sells sandals and different types of shoes. His customers are the pedestrians who are around day and night and he has done well by positioning himself in a commercial area with a lot of traffic which helps sales. Julio buys and sells retail with cash , although he has a few customers who buy on credit but they are the ones who sell his products retail in other markets. Although he has a lot of competition near his business, he has also found many opportunities in the market because the merchants know each other and there is a lot of cooperation.
Julio is a young man with great dreams, like having his own house, and that is why every day he persists in his work, although his challenge is his small amount of working capital. This is the reason he is requesting a Kiva loan with his first financing though the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. He will use it to buy a large quantity of shoes so that he can receive discounts while paying with cash, and he is saving up for the second half of the year when there are many holidays, vacations and especially Fathers Day. It is coming soon, and he has customers who have ordered sandals to give to their fathers. Besides this is a season of many sales. While Julio works hard to fulfill his dream of personal and business growth, he continues making an effort to raise the profit from his sales that are now no less than 32%.

loan.use: To buy sandals and a variety of shoes wholesale and with cash

loan.name: Dolores Isabel

texts.es:
La seora Dolores Isabel de la ciudad de Managua es una persona que se caracteriza por ser una mujer muy trabajadora, para darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia y as salir adelante para el futuro de sus hijos.
En esta oficina de Ceprodel se present a solicitar crdito la seora Dolores Isabel para invertir en su negocio de venta de comida y ropa, este crdito lo utilizara para compra de calzado, camiseta para nio y adulto, pantalones, ropa interior para varn y dama.
texts.en:
Dolores Isabel is from the city of Managua. She is a person noted for being a very hard working woman to provide a better standard of living for her family and to get ahead for her childrens future.
She came by the Ceprodel office to request a loan to invest in her food and clothing business. This loan will be used to buy shoes, childrens and adults t-shirts, pants and underwear for men and women.

loan.use: to buy clothes.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy adult pigs to sell and feed for them.

loan.name: Oscar Andrs

texts.es:
En el departamento de Managua el seor Oscar Andrs se ha caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, para poder darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia y as salir adelante.
En esta oficina de Ceprodel se present a solicitar crdito l seor Oscar Andrs para invertir en su negocio en la venta de perecedero, este crdito lo utilizara para compra verdura como papa, yuca, aguacate, naranja, limn agrio, mango ctc.
texts.en:
Oscar Andrs, from Managua department is known as a hard-working man who wants to be able to give his family a better quality of life and thus to get ahead.
Oscar Andrs came to the Ceproduel office to request a loan for his perishibles business to buy vegetables such as potatoes, yucca, avocados, oranges, limes, mangos, etc.

loan.use: to buy perishables (vegetables)

loan.name: Aligismat

texts.ru: Aligismat 40 let. On jenat i imeyet 2 detey. Aligismat yavlyayetsya IDP personom on pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda seychas projivayet v Baku regione vmeste so svoyey jenoy i detmi. On uje 5 let kak rabotayet voditelem mikroavtobusa kotoriy prinadlejit yemu. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit zapchasti dlya pochinki svoyey mashini.
texts.en:
Aligismat is 40 years old. He is married and has two children. Aligismat is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person). He is a refugee from Fuzuli city who now lives in Baku with his wife and children.
He has worked driving his own minivan for five years. Now he needs 2000 AZN to buy repair parts for his car.

loan.use: to buy parts for his car.

loan.name: Victor Antonio

texts.es:
En el departamento de Managua el seor Vctor Antonio se ha caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, para poder darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia y as salir adelante.
En esta oficina de Ceprodel se present a solicitar crdito l seor Vctor Antonio para invertir en su negocio en la venta de ropa interior y juguetes, tajada con queso este crdito lo utilizara para compra traje tpico, pelota carrito, pltano, repollo, tomate, aceite entre otro para la venta de tajada con queso.
texts.en:
In the Department of Managua, Vctor Antonio stands out for being a man that works very hard to be able to provide his family with a better standard of living and to get ahead this way.
Vctor Antonio came by this Ceprodel office to request a loan to invest in his business selling underwear, toys and tajadas con queso (typical Nicaraguan fried fast food.)
He will use this loan to buy traditional costumes, balls, toy cars, bananas, cabbage, tomatoes and oil, among other things for his tajada con queso sales.

loan.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loan.name: Kazim

texts.ru: Kazim jenat i imeyet 3 detey. On jivet v Baku regione vmeste so svoyey lubimoy semyoy. Kazim ochen lubit jivotnix i uje 10 let kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov. On prodayot molochniye produkti moloko, kefir, yogurt kotoriy delayet sam. Kazim imeyet mnogo kliyentov tak kak yego produkti ochen vkusniye i xoroshiye. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korov dlya uvelicheniya molochnoqo produkta. Kazim 44 qoda.
texts.en: Kazim is married and has three children. He lives in Baku with his beloved family. Kazim loves animals very much and has been working as a herdsman and cattle breeder for ten years. He sells dairy products that he makes himself, like milk, kefir and yogurt. Kazim has many customers because his goods are very good and tasty. Now he needs 2000 AZN to buy cows to increase milk production. Kazim is 44 years old.

loan.use: to buy cows.

loan.name: Latif

texts.ru: Latif 41 let. On jivet v Baku regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy. Latif jenat i imeyet 3 detey. Latif uje 7 let kak zanimayetsya prodajey pishevix produktov. Etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyeqo druqa kotoriy i pomog yemu otkrit etot magazin. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit produkti dlya preprodaji i razvitiya svoyego biznessa.
texts.en: Latif is 41 years old. He lives in Baku with his family. Latif is married and has three children. Latif has been a grocer for seven years. He started this business with his friend who helped him open the shop. Now he needs 2000 AZN to buy groceries to sell and to develop his business.

loan.use: to buy groceries for sale

loan.name: Makhir

texts.ru: Makhir jivet v Baku regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy. On jenat i imeyet 2 detey. Makhir 42 qoda. On uje 4 qoda kak rabotayet taxistom. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit zapchasti dlya pochinki svoyey mahsini tak kak on ne mojet perevozit kliyentov. Etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyeqo dyadi.
texts.en:
Makhir lives in Baku with his family. He is married and has two children. Makhir is 42 years old. He has been a taxi driver for four years.
Now he needs 2000 AZN to buy parts to repair his car since he cannot carry passengers without it. He started his business with his uncle.

loan.use: to buy parts to repair his taxi

loan.name: Santos William

texts.en:
Santos, age 25, is a hard-working entrepreneur who has been selling fruits and vegetables in the market for the past five years. This family-owned business has been passed down through the generations, and Santos is now managing the operations. It is his dream to be able to buy some land and construct a modest home, and perhaps have a family someday.
Santos would like to use his loan funds to buy a harvest of avocados to offer for sale at market.

loan.use: to buy a harvest of avocados to offer for sale at market

loan.name: Maritza Del Carmen

texts.es: En el departamento de Managua la seora Maritza Del Carmen es una persona que se caracteriza por ser una mujer muy trabajadora en campo de comercio, para darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia y as salir adelante para el futuro de sus hijos. En esta oficina de Ceprodel se present a solicitar crdito la seora Maritza Del Carmen para invertir en su negocio de un pequeo taller, este crdito lo utilizara para compra de materiales como tela tales como delantales, gabachas, cobertores.
texts.en:
In the Department of Managua, Maritza Del Carmen stands out for being a woman that works very hard in commerce to be able to provide a his family with a better standard of living and to get ahead for her childrens future this way.
Maritza Del Carmen came by this Ceprodel office to request a loan to invest in her small workshop. She will use the loan to buy merchandise like fabric, aprons, gabachas (vest style smocks) and coveralls.

loan.use: to buy merchandise.

loan.name: Djavid

texts.ru: Etot molodoy chelovek uje 5 let kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom. On jivet v Baku regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy. Djavid jenat i imeyet odnogo rebonka. Yemu 30 let. Etomu biznessu on nauchilsya u svoyeqo otca. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korovi dlya uvelicheniya molochnogo produkta dlya prodaji. Makhir proizvodit kefir i prodoyot ix v magazini.
texts.en:
This young man has been in the animal husbandry business for five years. He lives in the region of Baku together with his family. Djavid is married and has one child. He is 30 years old.
He has learned this business from his father. At this time he needs 2000 AZN to buy cows to increase the production of milk products for resale. Djavid makes kefir and sells it to the stores.

loan.use: to buy cows

loan.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es:
Juan de 44 aos, vive en una zona peri-urbana en la Perimetral. Es soltero. Su actividad es la venta de helado y fletes en triciclo.
Empez hace 15 aos un amigo le recomend y le gusto esa actividad porque poda recorrer por la ciudad. Vende desde las 8H00 am a 18H00 pm recorriendo por la ciudad. Con el prstamo quiere comprar mas mercadera de helados y un triciclo nuevo para poder trabajar mejor e incrementar mas sus ganancias. En un futuro desea terminar de construir su vivienda porque le hace falta enlucir y hacer el cerramiento.
texts.en:
Juan, 44, lives in a periurban zone in La Perimetral. Hes single. His business is frozen treat sales and cargo hauling with a three wheeled cart.
He started 15 years ago; a friend recommended it to him and he liked the activity because he can travel throughout the city. He sells from 8am until 6pm going throughout the city.
He wants to use the loan to buy more merchandise for the frozen treats and a new three wheeled cart to be able to work better and increase his profits. In the future, hed like to finish building his house because he still needs to plaster and seal.

loan.use: to buy frozen treats and a three-wheeled cart.

loan.name: Emprendedores Group

texts.es: ste Banco comunal se llama Emprendedores y est conformado por 15 emprendedores, pertenecientes a la comuna de Colina ubicada en la ciudad de Santiago. Todos ellos se dedican a diferentes rubros, especficamente venta de ropa, de alimentos, productos de limpieza y negocios en una feria libre. Ana quien en la foto se encuentra sentada en primera fila, en el segundo puesto de derecha a izquierda, se dedica a vender comida rpida, especficamente completos, churrascos, empanadas, sopaipillas y pizzas. Prepara y vende esta comida desde su casa, desde hace 4 aos y le ha ido muy bien en su negocio. Su horario laboral es de martes a sbado de 6 de la tarde a las 12 de la noche. Y los fines de semana ste horario se puede extender. Con el prstamo comprar materiales de construccin para acomodar su local en el patio de su casa, de sta manera podra obtener el permiso de salubridad correspondiente. Sus metas son establecer de manera ptima su negocio, para abrir durante todo el da, ya por ahora solo puede atender en las noches por falta del permiso. Adems anhela reestructurar su local para que sus clientes puedan consumir su comida en el mismo local. Ana vive junto a su marido y su hijo de 3 aos de edad. Sus sueos son convertir su trabajo en un negocio ms lucrativo, de esta manera tambin contratar personal y ser independiente econmicamente. Ella est muy agradecida de Fondo Esperanza, le gusta mucho participar de las reuniones, debido a la buena relacin con las dems socias del banco comunal. Colina es una comuna de la regin metropolitana (donde est Santiago, capital de Chile) ubicada al norte de la misma. Actualmente es centro de importantes inversiones, principalmente en el rea agro industrial, debido a la instalacin de grandes e importantes empresas, que de paso entregan un gran nmero de empleos a la comunidad. Es tambin un rea de parcelaciones de agrado, lo que ha contribuido a aumentar considerablemente el nmero de habitantes. Tambin cuenta con espacios adecuados al turismo, tales como termas, deporte en la Laguna Piedra Roja y montaismo.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called Emprendedores (Entrepreneurs) and is composed of 15 entrepreneurs belonging to the Colina Commune located in the city of Santiago. Each is in a different line of work, specifically clothes sales, food sales, cleaning supplies sales and businesses in farmers markets.
Ana, who appears in the photo seated in the front row, second from the right, sells fast food, specifically compuestos (Chilean hot dogs), turnovers, sopaipillas (fried flat dough) and pizzas. She prepares and sells the food from home. Shes been in business for four years and has done very well in her business. Her work schedule is Tuesday through Saturday from 6pm until midnight and on weekends this schedule can lengthen.
She will use the loan to buy building materials and supplies to furbish her locale in her yard so that she can get the corresponding health permit. Her goals are to put her business in optimal conditions so that she can be open all day since shes only able to operate at night now because she lacks the permit. Besides, she hopes to remodel the locale so that customers can consume their food there.
Ana lives with her husband and 3-year-old son. Her dreams are to make her business more lucrative so that she can also hire personnel and become economically independent.
She is very grateful to Fondo Esperanza. She enjoys participating in the meetings very much because of the good relationship she has with the other communal bank members.
Colina is a commune in the north part of the metropolitan region (where Santiago, capital of Chile is located.) It is currently the focus of important investments especially in agro business due to the arrival of large and important firms which, by the way, generate a large number of jobs in the community. It is also an area of parcelaciones de agrado (farmland turned into residential use) that has contributed significantly to the population increase. In addition, it has places that are ideal for tourism, like hot springs, sports at Piedra Roja Lagoon and mountaineering.

loan.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loan.name: Gladys Santos

texts.es: La seora Gladis se dedica a la venta de ropa interior. Tiene ms de 2 aos en este negocio, su negocio lo realiza de manera ambulante pues es la forma ms efectiva que tiene para vender y ofrecer sus productos. El crdito lo requiere para aumentar el capital y comprar productos como bxers, hilo dental, calcetas entre otros. Esta actividad es la fuente que tiene para complementar sus ingresos que tiene para mantener a su familia. Tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad que no estn a su cargo y trabajan de forma independiente.
texts.en: Gladis' business is selling underwear. She has more than two years experience in this business. She works as an itinerant street vendor as this is the most effective way she has of selling her products. She requires this loan to increase her capital and buy products such as boxer shorts, thongs, socks, etc. This business is the source of income with which Gladis supports her family. She has two grown-up children who are no longer in her care and work independently.

loan.use: to buy boxer shorts, thongs, socks, etc.

loan.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz de 47aos, vive en una zona peri-urbana en la Perimetral. Es soltera y tiene 3 hijos de 29, 13 y 12 aos los dos ltimos estudian en colegios fiscales. Se dedica a la venta de mariscos.
Empez hace 4 aos cuando salio del trabajo de la empacadora (jubilada), tiene contacto que le dejan mas barato el producto de mariscos. No tiene horario fijo pero sale a recorre dejando sus pedido a amigos y conocidos. Con la ayuda del prstamo quiere invertir en compras de mariscos y materiales de construccin para vivienda. Desea ponerse un expreso, comprar una camioneta para ofrecer transporte con ayuda del hijo o ponerla a recorrer vendiendo verdes o frutas
texts.en:
Luz is 47 years old and lives in a peri-urban area of La Perimetral. She is single and has three children aged 29, 13 and 12. Her two youngest children are in high school.
Luz's business is selling seafood. She started her business four years ago when she left her job as a packer (retired). She has a contact who provides her with discounted seafood. Luz doesn't work fixed hours but she goes out and fills orders from her friends and acquaintances. With the help of this loan, Luz would like to invest in buying seafood and building supplies for her home. She would like to buy a truck so that she can provide a transport service with the help of her son or use it to go out selling fruit or vegetables.

loan.use: to buy seafood and materials for building her home

loan.name: Nelly Leopoldina

texts.es:
Nelly de 58 aos, vive en una zona peri-urbana en el Fortn de Guayaquil, es separada y tiene 2 hijos de 35 y 30 aos son profesionales y trabajan. Tiene una mini tienda.
Empez hace 20 aos con una herencia que recibi de su papa decidi instalar un negocio y poco a poco fue creciendo. Empieza desde las 6H00 hasta en la noche que termina de atender a sus clientes. Vende recarga de $33 hasta $20, colas de $0.70, varios. Le dificultad en su negocio la delincuencia ya que hace unos 15 das le robaron a un cliente cuando compraba. Con la ayuda del prstamo quiere invertir en arroz, azcar, vitrinas para adecuar su negocio y aumentar sus ganancias en producto de ventas. En un futuro desea establecer su negocio con sucursales en la va principal, ya que las ventas han disminuido un poco.
texts.en:
Nelly, 58, lives in a periurban zone in El Fortn in Guayaquil. Shes separated and has two children who are 35 and 30 years of age; they are professionals and they work. She has a minimarket.
She started 20 years ago using an inheritance she got from her father. She decided to set up a business and it gradually grew. She starts working from 6am and goes until night when she finishes taking care of customers. She sells phone recharges ranging from $33 to $20, soft drinks for $0.70. and miscellaneous goods. The difficulty she faces in her business is the crime rate. About fifteen days ago a customer was robbed while shopping.
With help from the loan Nelly wants to buy rice, sugar and display cases to equip her store and increase profits on sales. In the future shed like to open branches of her store on the main thoroughfare because sales have diminished a bit.

loan.use: to buy rice, sugar and display cases.

loan.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Mara, vive en casa propia junto a sus hijos, de 25 y 28 aos de edad, ellos son independientes, y Mara se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva, aprendi por necesidad y lleva ya 8 aos en el comercio, su horario es de 7:00am a 6:00pm, de lunes a viernes. Actualmente solicita un prstamo para la compra de ropa nueva para comercializar, su compra ser en docenas de blusas, ropa interior de ambos sexos y ropa para nios, con esta compra espera tener mayor variedad de prendas de vestir para los clientes. Su objetivo es invertir en el negocio, que este tenga ms duracin ya que es su fuente de ingreso para solventar sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Mara lives in her own house, along with her 25 and 28 year old children, who are independent. Mara sells new clothing. She learned her business out of necessity and has been in business for eight years. Her schedule is from 7:00am to 6:00pm, Monday through Friday.
She is currently requesting a loan to buy new clothing to sell. She will purchase the following by the dozen: blouses, undergarments for both sexes, and clothing for children. With this purchase, she hopes to have a better variety of garments for her customers. Her objective is to invest in the business in order to give it more staying power, as it is the source of income that she uses to meet all of her needs.

loan.use: to buy clothing by the dozen: blouses, undergarments, and children's clothes

loan.name: Norma Yolanda

texts.es:
Norma de 41 aos, vive en una zona peri-urbana en la Perimetral. Su esposo es comerciante vende artculos varios. Y tienen dos hijos de 17 y 13 aos. Tiene una tienda.
Comenz hace un tiempo atrs cuando su esposo viajaba mucho por negocio y ella se dedicaba a cuidar nios un da decidi abrir una pequea tienda. Actualmente lo realiza con el esposo y uno de sus hijos. Con la ayuda del prstamo quiere comprar mas mercadera para poder surtir su negocio y as incrementar sus ganancias. En un futuro desea adecuar su vivienda terminarla de construir.
texts.en:
Norma, 41, lives in a periurban zone in La Perimetral in Guayaquil. Her husband is a merchant; he sells miscellaneous items. They have two children who are 17 and 13 years of age. She has a general store.
She started some time ago when her husband used to travel a lot on business and she cared for the children. One day she decided to open a small store. She currently runs it with her husband and one of her children.
With help from the loan she wants to buy more merchandise to stock the store and increase profits. In the future, shed like to finish building her house.

loan.use: to buy merchandise to sell like oil, bedspreads and comforters.

loan.name: Sop Serigne Malick Fall Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de solidarit est cr depuis le 11 mai 2010 veille de l'inauguration de son Banc Villageois d'appartenance. Il est compos de vingt femmes qui habitent le quartier, elles sont parentes et amies; la principale activit que mne le groupe est le petit commerce.
Madame Ndeye Lissa la responsable est ge de 28 ans, marie elle a un enfant en charge. Elle est couturire avec cinq ans d'exprience. Elle est debout droite sur la photo habille en corsage blanc avec un pagne multicolore tenant un chle noir dans sa main gauche.
Ndeye Lissa achte ses tissus et accessoires ncessaires pour la couture dans la capitale et les grandes villes confectionne des draps qu'elle revend au march hebdomadaire du village.
son prt lui permettra de renforcer son activit pour satisfaire la demande et gagner plus de revenus.
Elle ambitionne d'acheter une villa pour y loger sa grand mre;les dpenses de la famille et ses besoins personnels sont la charge du mari qui veut assurer de bonnes conditions de vie.
texts.en:
The Sop Serigne Malick solidarity group was created on May 11, 2010, the day before the inauguration of the "Banc Villageois" to which it belongs. It is composed of twenty women who live in the neighborhood; they are friends and family. The group's main activity is retail.
Mrs. Lissa, the group's leader, is 28 years old. She is married and has one dependent child. She is a seamstress with five years of experience. She is standing on the right of the picture, dressed in a white blouse with a multicolored "pagne" and holding a black scarf in her left hand.
Lissa purchases fabrics and the accessories necessary for sewing in the Capital and in big cities. She sews bed sheets which she sells at the village's weekly market.
Her loan will allow her to strengthen her activity to meet the demand and earn higher revenues.
Her ambition is to buy a villa to house her grandmother. The family's expenses and her personal needs are provided for by her husband, who wants to guarantee them good living conditions.

loan.use: to buy fabrics to sew bed sheets for retail.

loan.name: Emma Maria

texts.es:
Emma de 65 aos, vive en una zona urbana en el Guasmo (fue nombrado as debido a la especie de rboles Guazuma ulmifolia. El Guasmo es un barrio popular, de clase humilde, que anteriormente era una hacienda) de Guayaquil, es viuda y tiene 5 hijos mayores de edad. Tiene una tienda.
Comenz hace 15 aos , ella le gusto esta actividad ya que sus tos eran comerciante y le enseaba y desde entonce abri una tienda. Labora de 6H30 am a 9H30 pm diariamente y sola. Ella vende arroz colas y jugos. Con la ayuda del prstamo quiere invertir en vveres para sus ventas como colas jugos y varios productos para surtir el negocio e incrementar sus ganancias. Ella anhela comprarse un vehculo para poder movilizarse por salud y edad.
texts.en:
Emma is 65 years old and lives in an urban area of El Guasmo, in Guayaquil. El Guasmo is named after the 'Guazuma Ulmifolia' species of tree. It is a popular, low-income neighborhood which used to be a large estate. Emma is a widow and has five grown-up children.
Emma has a store which she set up 15 years ago. She enjoys this business as her aunt and uncle were salespeople. They taught her the business and she opened her own store. Emma works from 6.30am to 9.30pm every day, on her own. She sells rice, colas and juice. With the help of this loan, she would like to invest in food products to sell such as colas, juice and various other products. She will use these products to stock her business and increase her profits. She dreams of buying a vehicle so that she can get around in spite of her health and age.

loan.use: to buy food products, colas and juices

loan.name: Pellital Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Pellital a t cr le 17 Mai 2011 lors de linauguration leur Banc villageois. Il compte 25 membres tous issus du mme village. Leur activit principale est le petit commerce.
Madame Asmao est responsable du groupe. Elle est ge de 30 ans, est Divorce et mre de quatre enfants.
Elle vend des bananes activit trs rentable dans sa localit. Elle fait cette activit depuis un an et demi.
Son nouveau lui permettra de sapprovisionner en quantit en banane.
Elle compte soccuper de ses enfants afin de leur assurer un avenir meilleur.
texts.en:
The Pellital group was created on May 17, 2011, during the inauguration of their "Banc Villageois". It comprises 25 members, all from the same village. Their main activity is retail.
Mrs. Asmao is the group's leader. She is 30 years old, divorced and a mother of four.
She sells bananas, a very profitable activity in her town. She has been in this business for a year and a half.
Her new loan will allow her to get large supplies of bananas.
She intends to take care of her children to guarantee them a better future.

loan.use: to stock up on bananas.

loan.name: Rosaira

texts.es: Rosaira Vive en el barrio El Santuario al sur de la ciudad de Barranquilla, con su cnyuge y su hijo de 12 aos de edad; all en su propia casa tiene un negocio, que consiste en vender a crditos mercancas variadas como cosmticos, perfumes y accesorios, mediante guas especializadas de productos; ella comenz cuando hace 6 aos, una amiga le gener esa iniciativa, lo que a Rosaira le represent generar ingresos personales, que aplic a su propio hogar y especialmente al bienestar de su nico hijo, con el cual suea ver prspero y exitoso en un futuro. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo y con el comprar una vitrina mostrador para lograr una mejor exhibicin de sus mercancas, aplicando tcnicas de merchandising que impacten sus ventas, con tal de aumentar la rentabilidad desde el punto comercial y en consecuencia llamar la atencin de sus clientes hacia las mercancas que exhibir a propsito del da del padre y con ello lograr facilitar su accin de compra, porque la competencia es su mayor desafo y ella est aplicando todas las herramientas con tal de continuar sostenindose en el mercado y fortalecer su rentabilidad sobre las ventas en un porcentaje no menor del 25%.
texts.en:
