Rosaira lives in the El Santuario neighborhood, south of the city of Barranquilla, with her husband and her 12 year old son. She has a business in her own house, which consists of selling on credit a variety of merchandise, such as cosmetics, perfumes, and accessories, through catalogs. She started this business 6 years ago when a friend inspired her to get started. To Rosaira, this meant generating her own income, which she used for her own home and especially for the wellbeing of her only son. She dreams of seeing him prosper and be successful in the future.
Her Kiva loan is the first financing she has done with the Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo. With it she will buy a display vitrine so that she can better display her merchandise and apply merchandising techniques that will improve her sales. In this way she can increase her income from her store and also attract the attention of her customers toward her merchandise. She will display it in anticipation of Fathers Day and this will facilitate sales. Since competition is her greatest challenge, she is utilizing all of her tools so that she can continue in the market and strengthen her earning power, with a profit percentage of not less than 25%.

loan.use: to buy a display vitrine.

loan.name: Cesar Alberto

texts.es: Cesar, posee una sastrera y venta de ropa, tiene casa propia donde vive en compaa de su esposa, tiene 13 aos de ser comerciante y de confeccionar ropa. l necesita materiales de costura para lo cual solicita un prstamo y adquirir telas, hilos, botones, broches, tambin comprara ropa nueva para ofrecer a los clientes, esta inversin le ayudara a incrementar su produccin e ingresos para el hogar. Su objetivo con el prstamo, es proporcionar lo necesario para que sea estable y que los clientes encuentren lo que necesitan, tambin quiere crecer econmicamente con su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar has a tailoring business and also sells clothing. He has his own house, where he lives with his wife. He has sold and made clothing for 13 years.
He needs materials for sewing, so he is requesting a loan to buy fabrics, threads, buttons, and clasps. He will also buy new clothing to offer to his customers. This investment will help him to increase his production and his income for his household.
His goal with the loan is to use what is necessary to be economically stable and so that his customers will find what they need. He also wants to grow economically with his family.

loan.use: to buy fabrics, threads, buttons, and clasps.

loan.name: Karin Soledad

texts.es:
Karin de 32 aos, es casada, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijas en su casa propia que cuenta con agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Guadalupe, a unos 30 minutos de la provincia de Pacasmayo y a unahora del departamento de la Libertad. Esta zona se dedica ha la agricultura, ganadera y turismo.
Karin desde hace unos 3 aos a colocado en su domicilio una tienda con productos de primera necesidad (aceite,leche, arroz, azcar, etc.) y gaseosas, la cual cuenta en su zona con su propia clientela, con los ingresos que obtenga podr sacar adelante y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
Por eso a pedido un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles para comprar ms productos para su tienda y poderla implementar, con la finalidad que sus clientes encuentren lo necesario para su consumo. Permitindole a Karin pueda pagar su crdito, solventar sus gastos diarios y en un futuro cercano poder tener una tienda ms grande y con todo tipo de productos.
texts.en:
Karin, 32, is married living with her husband and two daughters in her own house that has water and electricity, located in Guadalupe District about 30 minutes from Pacasmayo Province and an hour from La Libertad Department. This is farming, livestock raising and tourism area.
About three years ago Karin set up a grocery store in her house stocked with basic need items (oil, milk, rice, sugar, etc.) and soft drinks. It has an established customer base in the area and income she earns makes it possible for her to support the family and improve its quality of life.
Because of that she has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2500 new sol loan to buy more products for the store to stock it with the aim in mind of her customers being able to find what they need to consume allowing Karin to repay the loan, meet her daily expenses and, in the near future, be able to have a larger store stocked with all sorts of products.

loan.use: to buy more stock items for her store.

loan.name: Tania Yesenia

texts.es:
Tania de 31 aos, vive en una zona urbana en el Guasmo (fue nombrado as debido a la especie de rboles Guazuma ulmifolia. El Guasmo es un barrio popular, de clase humilde, que anteriormente era una hacienda) de Guayaquil, su esposo es chofer y tiene un hijo de 9 aos que estudia en escuela particular. Tiene una papelera.
Cuando se hizo de compromiso se puso el negocio ya que tenia que cuidar a la hija y tenia que solventar en los gastos el hogar para ayudar a su esposo. Vende en su papelera como artculos escolares cuadernos plumas. Con la ayuda del prstamo quiere invertir en mas mercadera cuadernos varios artculos de papelera y snacks para incrementar sus ganancias. En un futuro dese seguir en su negocio y conservarse bien en salud y para familia tambin.
texts.en:
Tania, 31, lives in an urban zone in El Guasmo (so called because of a species of tree, Guazuma ulmifolia; El Guasmo is a popular, low income neighborhood that used to be a hacienda) in Guayaquil. Her husbands a driver and they have a 9-year-old son who goes to private school. She has a stationery shop.
When she became engaged she opened the store because she had to care for her child and cover household expenses to help her husband. She sells stationery items like school supplies, notebooks and pens. With help from the loan she wants to invest in more merchandise like assorted notebooks, stationery items and snacks to increase profits. In the future she hopes to stay in business and to stay healthy and that her family does too.

loan.use: to buy stationery items and snacks.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy milk.

loan.name: Mirna Karina

texts.es:
Mirna de 20 aos de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con los servicio de luz y agua, ubicada en el distrito de Pimentel que se encuentra a unos 10 minutos de la provincia de Chiclayo. La actividad que realizan es el comercio de productos y la pesca.
Mirna se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir y de productos de belleza, negocio que ha colocado en su domicilio desde hace unos 2 aos, su negocio ltimamente ha tenido ms acogida por a trado mercadera novedosa, lo que le ha permitido que sus ingresos se incrementen para poder solventar sus gastos personales.
Al observar Mirna que su negocio cada da va creciendo ha credo necesario solicitar un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadera y abastecer su tienda con productos innovadores, con la finalidad que su clientela siga aumentando para poder pagar su crdito y mejorar su calidad de vida, tambin para ayudar a las personas con las que vive.
texts.en:
Mirna de 20 aos de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con los servicio de luz y agua, ubicada en el distrito de Pimentel que se encuentra a unos 10 minutos de la provincia de Chiclayo. La actividad que realizan es el comercio de productos y la pesca.
Mirna se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir y de productos de belleza, negocio que ha colocado en su domicilio desde hace unos 2 aos, su negocio ltimamente ha tenido ms acogida por a trado mercadera novedosa, lo que le ha permitido que sus ingresos se incrementen para poder solventar sus gastos personales.
Al observar Mirna que su negocio cada da va creciendo ha credo necesario solicitar un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadera y abastecer su tienda con productos innovadores, con la finalidad que su clientela siga aumentando para poder pagar su crdito y mejorar su calidad de vida, tambin para ayudar a las personas con las que vive.

loan.use: Comprar mayor cantidad de mercadera para abastecer su negocio

loan.name: Elias Jose

texts.es: Elas, es originario de Nueva Guinea un pueblo ubicado en la regin del Atlntico sur del pas ah vivi durante 10 aos, posteriormente sus padres se mudaron a la ciudad de Leon que es donde vive actualmente, el tiene 33 aos de edad, esta casado, tiene 2 hijos de 10 y 2 aos de edad respectivamente, el se dedica a vender ropa, es comerciante, lleva tres aos en este negocio. El seor Elas inicio su negocio hacer tres aos, el comercializa mercadera en general, especficamente ropa de varn tales como pantalones, camisas, shorts. Su primera experiencia en los negocios fue a los 15 aos de edad, ya que sus padres son comerciantes tambin en el mercado de La Estacin de Buses en Len, con muchos esfuerzos y sacrificios instalo su propio negocio, se independizo de la tienda de sus padres. El solicito el prstamo para comprar mercadera en general como pantalones, camisas de mujer, camisetas. El espera que con esta inversin, le brinde la oportunidad de mejorar las condiciones de su negocio. En un futuro le gustara tener suficientes ahorrors para poder construir su propia casa, realizar mejoras a su local, poder poner piso de cermica, hacerles paredes para dar una mejor presentacin a su local de venta.
texts.en:
Elias, is from Nueva Guinea, a town in the South Atlantic region of the country. He lived there for 10 years, after his parents moved to the city of Leon which is where he now lives. Elias is 33 years old, married, and has 2 children that are 10 and 2 years old respectively. He is a merchant who sells clothes and has spent three years in this business.
Elias sells general merchandise, specifically male clothing such as pants, shirts, shorts. His first business experience was at 15 years old, because his parents are also traders in the market at the Bus Station in Leon. With much effort and sacrifice he installed his own business and became independent from his parents' shop.
The requested loan is to buy general merchandise such as pants, women's shirts, and t-shirts. He hopes that with this investment, he will be given the opportunity to improve business conditions. In the future he would like to save enough to build his own home, and make improvements to the premises, such as putting down a ceramic floor and a wall to give a better presentation of his local shop.

loan.use: to buy general merchandise such as pants, women's shirts, and t-shirts.

loan.name: Asuncion

texts.es:
Asuncin padre de familia de 30 aos de edad, vive con su esposa y su hijo en casa de unos familiares; cuenta con solo el servicio de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Jos Leonardo Ortz, que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo. Los pobladores de ste distrito se dedican al comercio al por mayor y menor de productos y agricultura.
Desde algunos aos Asuncin se dedica a manejar su mototaxi (transporte que se utiliza para movilizarse en distancias cortas, con un cupo mximo de 3 personas), actividad que realiza en su mismo distrito llevando personas a diferentes destinos, cuenta con algunos clientes fijos, a pesar de la competencia que existe, trata en lo posible de movilizar la mayor cantidad de pasajeros, con los ingresos que deja su actividad trata de solventar sus obligaciones familiares.
El crdito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 2000 nuevos soles y su destino ser para brindar mantenimiento a su unidad mvil y pueda seguir brindando un buen servico, pero tambin lo utilizar para cubrir algunos gastos personales. Asuncin es un hombre muy respetado y conocido en la zona donde vive por ser trabajador, responsable y buen padre, con el nico fin de que a su familia no le falte nada.
texts.en:
Asuncin is a 30-year-old father living with his wife and son in a house belonging to relatives that only has electricity located in the rural part of Jos Leonardo Ortz District belonging to Chiclayo Province. Residents of the district are retail and wholesale merchants of products and are farmers.
For a few years now Asuncin has been a mototaxi driver (mode of transportation used to go short distances with a maximum of three passengers) in his own district taking people to various destinations. He has a few regular customers despite existing competition. He tries his best to transport the largest number of passengers and uses income generated by this activity to try to cover family obligations.
The loan hes asked Edpyme Alternativa for is for 2000 new soles and it will be used to service the mototaxi in order to continue to offer good service but hell also use it to cover some personal expenses. Asuncin is a much respected, well known man in his local area for being hard working, responsible and a good father whose only aim is that his family have everything they need.

loan.use: to service his mototaxi and covers a few personal expenses.

loan.name: Vilma Guadalupe

texts.es: Vilma, vive con su esposo y una hija, tiene casa propia, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, aprendi a elaborar las tortillas por su madre, y las vende desde hace 10 aos, su negocio est ubicado en el mercado municipal, tiene un horario de 6:00am a 5:00pm. Actualmente solicita un prstamo para la compra de maz, lea y gas, estos materiales son para la produccin de tortillas, lo que ella pretende es que a travs del prstamo pueda adquirir estos materiales a un mejor precio especficamente el maz, que lo puede comprar por mayor cantidad para almacenarlo. Sus aspiraciones es tener un negocio fuerte, con ms capacidad para atender a los clientes, mejorar tambin las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Vilma lives with her husband and daughter in their own home. She has earned her living selling tortillas for the past ten years; her mother taught her how to make them. The business is located in the local market, and she works there from 6am to 5pm.
Vilma is seeking a loan to buy corn, firewood, and fuel--all of which she needs to make the tortillas. She hopes to buy these items, especially the corn, at a lower price as she can buy in bulk and store them. Her hopes for the future are to have a strong business, the capacity to serve more customers, and to improve the standard of living of her family.

loan.use: to buy corn, firewood, and fuel

loan.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro de 33 aos de edad es un padre de familia que vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos, en casa en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios bsicos, en el distrito de Olmos, a una hora de distancia del departamento de Lambayeque. Se caracteriza por ser una zona de mucha actividad agricola y ganadera.
Alejandro se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas ) y caprino (cabras) desde hace 6 aos, su corral donde se encuentran sus animales est en la parte posterior de su casa, los cra con alimentos balanceados como con pastos naturales y una vez que tengan el peso y el tamao ptimo los ofrece en el mercado de Lambayeque. Con el dinero que va adquirir por sus animales podr atender las necesidades diarias de su hogar y familia.
A solicitado un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar ms ganado y su respectivo alimento, asegurando un buen crecimiento y engorde de sus animales y poderlos ofertar a un mejor precio. Alejandro es conocida en la zona por ser una persona trabajadora, responsable y como todo padre quiere sacar a su familia adelante.
texts.en:
Alejandro de 33 aos de edad es un padre de familia que vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos, en casa en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios bsicos, en el distrito de Olmos, a una hora de distancia del departamento de Lambayeque. Se caracteriza por ser una zona de mucha actividad agricola y ganadera.
Alejandro se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas ) y caprino (cabras) desde hace 6 aos, su corral donde se encuentran sus animales est en la parte posterior de su casa, los cra con alimentos balanceados como con pastos naturales y una vez que tengan el peso y el tamao ptimo los ofrece en el mercado de Lambayeque. Con el dinero que va adquirir por sus animales podr atender las necesidades diarias de su hogar y familia.
A solicitado un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar ms ganado y su respectivo alimento, asegurando un buen crecimiento y engorde de sus animales y poderlos ofertar a un mejor precio. Alejandro es conocida en la zona por ser una persona trabajadora, responsable y como todo padre quiere sacar a su familia adelante.

loan.use: Comprar ms animales y su respectivo alimento

loan.name: Sifaga

texts.en:
Sifaga is 51 years of age and married with five children. She owns and operates a business venture, planting and harvesting taro for sale. She has three years of experience in this business.
Sifaga needs a loan of 2,000 WST to purchase general farm supplies and equipment. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 300 talas or $125 per week) to improve the business.
In 2007, Sifaga joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Sifaga's 5th loan with SPBD.

loan.use: to purchase general farm supplies and equipment.

loan.name: Moemauu

texts.en:
Moemauu is 37 years of age and married with four children. She owns and operates a business venture, selling general hand-woven products to tourists and local community members. She has two years of experience in this business.
Moemauu needs a loan of 1,500 WST to purchase raw materials to make woven products. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 250 talas or $104 per week) to improve the business.
In 2010, Moemauu joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Moemauu 's 2nd loan with SPBD.

loan.use: to purchase raw materials to make woven products.

loan.name: Luz Amparo

texts.es:
Luz es una madre de familia de 44 aos de edad, tiene casa propia donde vive con su esposo e hijos, contando con los servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Pacasmayo, que se encuentra a una hora aproximadamente del departamento de la Libertad. Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadera y turismo.
La actividad que desarrolla Luz es ha la venta de productos de primera necesidad (arroz, leche, aceite, azcar, huevos, etc), su negocio est en su propio domicilio desde hace varios aos, al encontrarse su negocio en su casa puede atender a cualquier hora, lo que le permite diferenciarse de otras tiendas y as pueda obtener ms ingresos para sus gastos personales.
El crdito solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 2000 nuevos soles, el cual lo destinar para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadera y poder ampliar su negocio con otros productos una vez que sus ventas aumenten. El sueo de Luz es tener ms adelante una tienda ms grande que le genere mayores ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida y lo lograr con su trabajo y dedicacin.
texts.en:
Luz is a 44-year-old mother. She owns her house where she lives with her husband and children. It has water and electricity and is located in Pacasmayo District which is about an hour from La Libertad Department. This zone is farming, livestock raising and tourism area.
Luzs activity is selling basic need items (rice, milk, oil, sugar, eggs, etc.). Her store is located in her house and has been open for several years. Since its located in her house she can tend to it at all hours which differentiates hers from other stores and she can obtain more income for her personal expenses.
She asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to buy larger amounts of merchandise to enlarge the store with other products once her sales increase. Luzs dream for later on is to have a larger store that generates larger income to improve her quality of life and she will accomplish this with her work and dedication.

loan.use: to enlarge her store and to buy stock items for it.

loan.name: Erasmo Osmar

texts.es: Erasmo, tiene 34 aos de edad, habita en la comarca el Jicarito ubicada en el departamento de Len, de oficio agricultor, el se dedica a sembrar maz, es padre de 2 hijos de 2 y 6 aos respectivamente. El aprendi este oficio por su padre ya que tambin era agricultor, el recuerda que desde temprana edad su padre lo llevaba al campo para que aprendiera a preparar la tierra, desde la 4 de la maana estaba despierto para prepararse e irse al campo a trabajar largas jornadas, y caminar 10 km para poder llegar hasta los terrenos de siembra, el solo estudio hasta tercer ao de secundaria pues tuvo que dedicarse a trabajar con su padre para poder comer, seguir sobreviviendo. Cuando el cumpli 22 aos de edad se independiz de su padre e inicio su propio negocios de siembras adems el vende leche pues tiene dos vacas y vende lea tambin. El es un hombre muy trabajador que busca como sacar su familia adelante. El solicito el prstamo para la compra de insumos agrcolas y pago de mano de obra que va a utilizar para la siembra de 5 manzanas de maz. Este crdito le ayudara a sembrar y obtener ganancias que le permitan ahorrar y compra tierras para siembra. En sus planes futuros quiere siempre seguir sembrando, poder comprar mas ganado y aumentar sus areas de siembra.
texts.en:
34-year old Erasmo lives in the Jicarito region in the department of Len. He is a farmer and grows corn. He has two children aged two and six. His father taught him how to work the land as he also was a farmer. He remembers that from an early age his father used to take him to the fields and show how him how to prepare the earth. He used to wake up at four in the morning to get ready to leave for long workdays, walking 10km to get to the fields.
Erasmo only completed third year of secondary school because he had to leave to work with his father in order to be able to eat and survive. When he was 22 years old, he left home and began to work on his own land. He also sells milk (he has two cows) and firewood. He is a hardworking person who is trying to find ways to help his family get ahead.
The loan that Erasmo is seeking is to buy agricultural supplies and hire someone to help him sow five manzanas (one manzana = 1.68 acres) of corn. In this way the money will help him earn profits from his fields that he can save and then use to buy more land. In the future he wishes to continue farming, and buy more livestock and land.

loan.use: to buy agricultural supplies and sow five manzanas of corn

loan.name: Jesus Artidoro

texts.es:
Jess es padre de familia de 27 aos, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande a unos 40 minutos del departamento de Piura. Los pobladores de esta zona laboran en agricultura, ganadera y artesana.
Desde hace buen tiempo Jess cuenta con un taller de mecnica que a colocado en su domicilio, donde presta servicio de mantenimiento y reparacin de autos, por el tiempo que vive y labora en el mismo lugar tiene su propia clientela, adems del buen servicio que brinda, con los ingresos que obtenga podr solventar sus gastos familiares.
Al observar que su negocio va creciendo a solicitado un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles mediante Capital Semilla para implementar y mejorar su taller y as pueda incrementar sus ingresos y adquirir nuevos clientes. Jess es una persona trabajadora, empeosa y muy responsable con su trabajo como con su familia por eso quiere sacarla adelante y darles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jess is a 27-year-old father living with his wife and children in his own house which has water and electricity and is located in Tambogrande District about 40 minutes from Piura Department. Residents of this zone work in farming, raise livestock and are craftspeople.
For some time now Jess has had a vehicle repair shop located at home where he provides maintenance and repair services for autos. Because of the length of time hes lived and worked at the location he has his own established clientele in addition to the good service he offers. With income he earns hes able to cover family expenses.
Noting that the business is growing hes asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan through its Capital Seed program to equip and improve his shop so that income will increase and hell acquire new customers. Jess is a hard working, dedicated, very responsible person at work and with his family and this is why he wants to move them ahead and provide a better quality of life for them.

loan.use: to equip and improve his auto repair shop.

loan.name: Evenilda

texts.es: Evenilda, posee un comedor, vive con su esposo y un hijo D. 8 aos D. edad, el negocio es el comedor y la venta D. tortillas, lo tiene ubicado en el mercado municipal, su horario es D. 6:00am a 5:00pm, lo inicio hace 10 aos. Ella est solicitando un prstamo para la compra D. maz para preparar tortillas, carnes, pollo, arroz, condimentos y bebidas, para el comedor, esta compra le permitir tener los materiales necesarios para la produccin en el negocio, contara con ingresos ms estables para su hogar. Tiene como inspiracin para el futuro, ser duea D. un comedor granD., con mayor capacidad para atender a los clientes, mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia y sobretodo que su hijo pueda estudiar y culminar una carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Evenilda owns a small restaurant and sells tortillas in the local market. She works there from 6am to 5pm and has had the business for ten years. She lives with her husband and her 8-year old son.
Evenilda is seeking a loan to buy corn to make tortillas, as well as meat, chicken, rice, seasoning, and drinks. These items will proviD. her with the ingredients necessary to make the food for her restaurant and give her a regular income.
In the future she hopes to be the owner of a large restaurant with the capability of serving many customers, to improve the standard of living of her family, and above all she would like to see her son study hard and complete university.

loan.use: to buy corn to make tortillas, as well as meat, chicken, rice, seasoning, and drinks

loan.name: Jose Luis

texts.en:
Jose Luis is 39 years old and lives with his partner and two young children. With a systems and engineering background, Jose Luis has owned and operated for two years a small internet caf that also offers international phone calls, photocopies and faxing.
He intends to use the loan proceeds to invest in his business (new computers, a photocopier, etc). Jose Luis hope is that all of his hard work will grow the business to the point where he can buy his own property for the business, instead of continuing to pay rent as he is now.

loan.use: to buy new computers, a photocopier, etc.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy rice, oil, sugar, potatoes, tomatoes and onions.

loan.name: Aracely Guadalupe

texts.es: Aracely, se dedica al destazo D. cerdos y venta D. queso, vive con su esposo y tienen dos hijos uno D. 15 aos y el otro D. 18 aos D. edad, el negocio D. ella lo aprendi a travs D. su madre desD. hace 12 aos, lo tiene ubicado en el mercado municipal y lo atienD. con un horario D. 6:00am a 4:00pm. Ella solicita un prstamo porque necesita comprar cerdos y tambin queso para comercializar, con esta inversin Aracely contara con cerdos para continuar el destazo y con el queso igualmente, servir mejor a los clientes. Su objetivo es tener capacidad para atender a bastantes clientes, con suficiente productos D. queso y carne D. cerdo, para abastecer la demanda.
texts.en:
Aracely lives with her husband and two children, ages 15 and 18. She sells pork and cheese and has been learning her traD. from her mother for 12 years. She has a stand in the muncipal market where she works from 6:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.
She is requesting a loan to buy pigs and cheese. With this investment, Aracely will have enough pigs to keep selling pork and enough cheese to keep serving her customers as best she can.
Her goal is to be able to sell to a considerable amount of customers, and having enough cheese and pork to supply the demand.

loan.use: To buy pigs and cheese.

loan.name: Xiomara Del Carmen

texts.en: Xiomara, a 37-year-old single mother of a 12 year-old, has been selling clothing in the local market for the last three years. An extremely hard worker, Xiomaras only wish is to be able to continue providing adequately for her son and herself. The loan will assist Xiomara to buy a new inventory of clothes to sell during the upcoming family-focused holidays.

loan.use: to buy a new inventory of clothes.

loan.name: Juana Aracelly

texts.es: La seora Juana tiene 41 aos de edad, habita en la ciudad de Len, tiene tres hijos, de oficio comerciante, ella se dedica a vender comida y a vender ropa usada. Cuando ella inicio en este negocio tenia 19 aos de edad, venda frutas en el mercado esto lo hizo durante 8 aos, despus decidi vender ropa usada , de ultimo vender comida que ella misma prepara y reparte a los clientes que ya tiene, esto lo hace todos los das , se levanta desde muy tempranas horas a prepararse para un da agitado de mucho trabajo ya que por las maanas cocina y por las tardes se dedica a vender ropa usada. Su marido trabaja como taxista y con lo que gana le ayuda a ella para pagar los gastos del hogar, todos sus hijos ya estn adultos y trabajan por su cuenta. Solicita el prstamo para capital de trabajo, quiere comprar ropa usada en gran cantidad e invertir en su negocio de comidas. Con esta inversin ella desea surtir su negocio, para atraer mas clientes , mejorar sus ventas e ingresos . En lo futuro solo le gustara dedicarse a vender solo comida y refrescos, pues le gusta cocinar, es un arte que ella disfruta. Su meta prxima es darle mejores condiciones a su comideria, quiere darle una mejor presentacin .
texts.en:
Mrs. Juana, 41, lives in the city of Len and has three children. She is a merchant who sells food and second-hand clothing. She began her business when she was 19 years old. For eight years she sold fruit at the market, then decided to sell second-hand clothing. She then added food to her business line, which she prepares and sells everyday to her customers. She gets up very early to prepare for her busy workday. In the morning she cooks and in the afternoon sells clothing. Her husband works as a taxi driver and helps cover household expenses. All her children are adults and work indepedently.
She is requesting a loan to use as work capital because she wants to buy more second-hand clothing and invest in her food business. She plans to stock her business better to attract more customers and improve sales and income. In the future she would like to sell only food and softdrinks since she likes to cook and considers it to be an art she enjoys. Her next goal is to upgrade her eatery, to make it look nicer.

loan.use: To buy more second-hand clothing.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy cedar wood, paint, glue and nails.

loan.name: Juan Emilio

texts.es:
Juan de 34 aos, vive en la Primavera de Duran (permetro urbano fue originalmente irregular, con varios cerros, riachuelos y lagunas que an se presentan como restos de una ecologa en disolucin). Su esposa es ama de casa y tienen tres hijos que estudian en escuelas fiscales. Se dedica a la ventas de helados
Comenz hace un tiempo antes venda caramelo pero vendo que no era rentable y no haba ganancia que decidi por vender helados y poco a poco fue creciendo y estableci su negocio en la ventas de helados. Labora de 8H30 am a 6H00 pm en su negocio. Con la ayuda del prstamo desea comprar materiales de construccin para adecuar su vivienda. En un futuro dese culminar su vivienda tener otro negocio mas estable para darle lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan, 34, lives in Primavera in Duran (originally an irregular urban outlying area with several hills, streams and lagoons that remain still as remnants of an ecology in dissolution). His wife is a housewife and they have three children who go to public school. He sells ice cream.
He started some time ago selling candy but seeing that this wasnt profitable and produced no profits, he decided to sell ice cream and gradually grew until he established an ice cream sales business. He works from 8:30am until 6pm. With help from the loan he plans to buy building materials and supplies to do some home improvements. In the future, hed like to finish the house and have another, more stable, business to provide the best for his family.

loan.use: to buy cement, sand and paint.

loan.name: Jose Ramon

texts.es: Jos Ramn tiene su negocio que es una pulpera. Hace ms de 6 aos que tiene esta actividad. Inicio con fondos propios ya que no tenia los suficientes ingresos para mantener a su familia, sus hijos estn a su cargo todos los das Jos se levanta temprano para empezar a atender a sus clientes. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de golosina, refrescos, pan galletas y grano bsicos.
texts.en: Jos Ramn has had a grocery store business for more than six years. He started his business -- with his own funds -- because he did not have enough income to support his family. He takes care of his children every day and he wakes up early to serve his customers. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy candy, soft drinks, bread, cookies and basic grains.

loan.use: to purchase candy, soft drinks, bread, cookies, and basic grains.

loan.name: Bertha Cecilia

texts.es:
Bertha de 65 aos, vive en una zona peri-urbana en el Fortn de Guayaquil, es separada y tiene tres hijos de 37, 30 y 28 aos todos profesionales y trabajan. Su actividad es la venta de comidas rpidas corviches.
Empez hace 25 aos vendiendo papas rellenas y corviches (comida hecha en verde pltanos y pescado).en Manabi con sus ahorros compro un terreno en Guayaquil e instalo su negocio de comidas rpidas. Labora desde las 6H00 am primero va al mercado a comprar el pescado y el verde para la preparacin del corviche para sus ventas. Cada corviches lo vende a 0,30 ctvs. Con la ayuda del prstamo quiere invertir en sus medicinas por salud y compras de verdes, gas y vitrinas para incrementar sus ganancias. En un futuro desea terminar de construir su casa ya que con los crditos de D-miro avanza considerablemente.
texts.en:
Bertha is 65 years old and lives in a peri-urban area in el Fortin de Guayaquil. She is separated and has three children ages 37, 30 and 28 years old and they are all working professionals. She sells fast food corviches (a dish made out of green bananas and fish).
She started her business 25 years ago selling stuffed potatoes and corviches in Manabi. She bought a plot of land in Guayaquil with her savings and set up her fast food business there. She works from 6:00am. She first goes to the market to buy the fish and the green banana to prepare the corviche for her sales. She sells each corviche for 30 cents. With the help of this loan she wants to invest in medication for her health and in buying green bananas, gas and display cases in order to increase her profits. In the future she wants to finish building her house since with the loans from field partner Banco D-MIRO S.A. she is able to advance considerably.

loan.use: to purchase her medicine and to purchase green bananas, gas and display cases for her fast food business.

loan.name: Tule

texts.es: Tule es una mujer muy organizada que planea todo lo que hace y con eso est logrando salir adelante al lado su hijo de 18 aos , del cual anhela se proyecte como buen ciudadano, miembro de familia, buen trabajador, pero principalmente que sea siempre una buena persona y conozca que cuenta con su padre y con su madre. Tule conoce el arte de la peluquera y el maquillaje porque estudi y practica esta actividad en un punto de su vivienda, en el cual trabaja para resaltar la buena imagen de las clientes que atiende y que son damas, lnea en la que le gusta trabajar porque ella es una experta en dejarlas bellas, Ofreciendo los servicios de corte, tinturado y blower. Tule logr adecuar su saln de belleza a base de esfuerzos, pues tambin se dedica a una actividad comercial, de tal manera que en su negocio las clientes encuentran ropa escogida por ella en su buen gusto, cosmticos, calzado y artculos que le encargan, porque conocen que ella sabe lo que les gusta o necesitan. Su mayor desafo es llegar a los clientes con los principios especiales con los que ella quiere trabajar, como el respeto, la responsabilidad y la puntualidad principalmente. Cuando indic su negocio tom una lista de amigas y le ofreci un muestrario y aunque no maneja guas especializadas ella se las ingeni para comprar los productos que caen bien a sus clientes y a un precio competitivo. Su meta personal ms adelante es adecuar completamente su saln de belleza y tener vitrinas para ordenar y exhibir los productos que vende, ya sean asociados a su arte o accesorios que sus clientes necesitan, porque adems Tule brinda como valor agregado el servicio de asesora en belleza a sus clientes porque su propsito principal es lograr que siempre piensen y decidan regresar. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que Tule hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprar una vitrina, accesorios, secadores profesionales y mucho maquillaje para actualizar su microempresa y convertirla en punto agradable de encuentro entre bellas mujeres que quieren realzar su imagen personal y profesional.
texts.en:
Tule is a woman who is very well-organized. She plans everything she does and is successfully getting ahead together with her 18-year-old son. She wants him to be a good citizen, family member, and hard worker, but mainly a good person who knows he can count on his father and mother.
Tule is familiar with the art of hair dressing and make-up because she studied and put it into practice in her own home. She works to make her lady customers look the best they can. She enjoys her work because she is an expert in beauty services. She offers hair cuts, color and blow-drying. Tule was able to set up her salon through much effort since she also is involved in sales. Her customers come to her to buy clothing, cosmetics, shoes and other articles they order because of her good taste. Her greatest challenge is to treat and be treated by her customers with the special principles that she works by such as respect, responsibility and punctuality.
When she sat up her business she made a list of friends and showed them samples, and even though she wasn't used to using specialized catalogues, managed to buy products at competitive prices that her customers liked. Her personal goal for the future is to upgrade her beauty salon and have display cases to organize and display the products she sells, whether beauty products or accessories the customers need. Tule feels it is necessary to offer beauty advice because her main objective is to have the customer return. this is her first credikiva through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. She will use it to buy a display case, accessories, professional hair-dryers and a lot of make-up to upgrade her small business and turn it into a nice meeting point for women who want to improve their personal and professional image.

loan.use: To buy a display case, accessories, professional hair dryers and make-up.

loan.name: Luzmila Rufina

texts.es:
Luzmila de 59 aos, vive en una zona peri-urbana en la Perimetral. Esta casada. Ella tiene una ferretera.
Cuando su esposo salio de su ultimo trabajo recibi una liquidacin con la cual pusieron esta actividad y trabajen juntos. En su ferretera vende cables a $2,18 dependiendo de las medidas, tubos a $5,10. labora con su esposo desde las 8H30 am a 18H00 pm diariamente. Con la ayuda del prstamo desea invertir en mas materiales como materiales elctricos y tubos para sus respectivas ventas y surtir mas el negocio. En un futuro desea abrir otro local y ademas terminar de adecuar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Luzmila is 59 years old. She lives on the Perimetral (ring road) on the outskirts of Guayaquil. She is married and has a hardware store.
When her husband left his last job, he received a settlement that they used to start up this business, and they work together. In the hardware store, they sell cables for $2.18, or by measurement, and pipes for $5.10. She works with her husband from 8:30 am to 6:00 pm every day. With the help of the loan, she wants to invest in more materials, such as electrical items and pipes, to sell and to stock the business better. In the future, she wants to open another location and in, addition, finish fixing up their house.

loan.use: to buy electrical materials and pipes for her hardware store.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy chickens for the farm.

loan.name: Calle Alajuela (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Calle Alajuela se rene cada quince das en el Cantn Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesana que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
Este es un grupo de personas que decidieron unirse y formar este Banco Comunal que les sirve de mucho, ya que con los crditos mejoran sus pequeos negocios. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio en general, artesana, servicios, venta de comidas entre otras actividades.
Aqu conocimos a don Franklin, tiene 50 aos, est casado y de esa relacin tiene una hija de 12 aos de edad, la misma que estudia en escuela. Su esposa es ama de casa. Este es su primer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los intereses son ms bajos que en otros lugares que dan crditos.
El trabaja de chofer en el Municipio de Montecristi, pero adems junto a su esposa tienen una mini tienda de comestibles en su casa en la cual venden productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azcar, aceites, detergentes, etc. Tambin venden ropa de todo tipo. El trabaja en las noches cuando llega de su trabajo pero su esposa se dedica durante el dia a atender el negocio. Tienen dos aos que se dedican a esta actividad y les va bastante bien, lo que es ropa la compran en Guayaquil.
Con este crdito van a comprar productos de primera necesidad para surtir su tienda y ropa de todo tipo.
Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada da ms para el bien de su familia.
texts.en:
The Calle Alajuela community bank meets every two weeks in the Montecristi canton. It is known for its rich culture and artisanal crafts both nationally and internationally. It is the home of the famous paja toquilla hats.
This is a group of people who decided to get together and form this community bank, which has been very useful for them. They have improved their small businesses with the loans. They work in different activities such as general commerce, artisanal crafts, services, and selling food, among other things.
Here we meet Franklin. He is 50 years old, married and a father of a 12 year old daughter who goes to school. His wife is a housewife. This is his first cycle in the community bank and he likes it because the interests are lower than other places that give loans.
He works as a driver in the town of Montecristi. In addition, with his wife he has a mini-store that sells food in their house where they sell basic necessity products such as rice, sugar, oils, detergents, etc. He also sells all types of clothing. He works nights when he comes home from work, but his wife attends to the business during the day. They have been doing this activity for two years and it is going very well for them. They buy the clothes in Guayaquil.
With this loan, they are going to buy basic necessity products to supply their store and all types of clothing.
His goals are to keep going ahead and for his store to grow more every day for the family's wellbeing.

loan.use: to buy basic necessity products and clothing.

loan.name: Noche De Luna Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "Noche de L." y se ubica en el estado de Mxico. Esta comunidad se distingue porque cuenta con varias actividades economicas que fomentan el autoempleo. El grupo est conformado por 9 integrantes y es la primera vez que solicita un prestamo. La seora Mercedes es integrante del grupo. Ella es originaria de la comunidad y se dedica a la venta de pruductos naturistas; actividad que inici hace 4 aos. Sus ventas las realiza en los alrededores de su comunidad haciendolas de casa en casa. Mercedes comenta que su negocio le permitio salir adelante y como es madre soltera busca dia a dia darle los valores a sus hijos y fortaleza para seguir con sus estudios, ahora su sueo es seguir invirtiendo en su negocio para tener siempre productos que ofrecer. La seora tiene 33 aos, estudio la primaria, es divorciada y tiene 1 hijo que en la actualidad depende econmicamente de ella. Gracias a su negocio los ha sacado adelante con sus estudios. Quiere el prestamo para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, durante los ltimos 4 aos le ha dado la oportunidad de mantener a su familia. Actualmente tiene la fe de que saldra adelante as como tener ms ventas. Y as seguir logrando sus sueos, que su hijo llegue a tener una carrera que les permita tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This group is named "Noche de L." (moonlit night) and is located in the state of Mexico. This community is significant because it has many economic activities that promote self-employment. The group consists of 9 members and this is the first time that it is requesting a loan. Mercedes is a member of the group. She is originally from the community and she has been selling natural products for four years. She carries out her sales around the community making them from house to house. Mercedes says that this business allowed her to succeed. Since she is a single mother she strives every day to give her children values and to have the strength to continue her studies. Her dream now is to continue investing in her business so that she always has products to offer. Mercedes is 33, she went to elementary school, is divorced and has one child who is currently financially dependent on her. Thanks to her business she has been able succeed with her studies. She wants this loan to continue investing in her business which has given her the opportunity to support her family during the last four years. She has faith that she will succeed and will have more sales and will continue to achieve her dream that her son will have a career that will allow them to have a better quality of life.

loan.use: to purchase natural products for her business.

loan.name: Vicenta Del Rosario

texts.es: Vicenta is a 60 year-old married mother of one child. Over fifteen years ago when her husband was out of work, Vicenta went door-to-door selling fish and other seafood. As her business as grown over the years, she has been able to buy her own boat and motor. Vicenta is very proud of how her hard work has helped maintain her family, and her hope is to continue to do be able to do so. The loan will be used to buy additional shrimp, lobsters, and other seafood to help maintain and grow her business.
texts.en: Vicenta is a 60 year-old married mother of one child. Over fifteen years ago when her husband was out of work, Vicenta went door-to-door selling fish and other seafood. As her business as grown over the years, she has been able to buy her own boat and motor. Vicenta is very proud of how her hard work has helped maintain her family, and her hope is to continue to do be able to do so. The loan will be used to buy additional shrimp, lobsters, and other seafood to help maintain and grow her business.

loan.use: buy additional shrimp, lobsters, and other seafood to help maintain and grow her business

loan.name: Francisco Mario

texts.es: Francisco, se dedica a la venta de ropa y enseres del hogar, vive con su familia, su esposa y dos hijos, quienes dependen econmicamente de l; El negocio inicio por decisin propia, desde joven se dedica al comercio, no tiene un horario fijo. Actualmente necesita capital para trabajar, por lo que solicita un prstamo, el cual se pueda invertir en mercadera como: ropa (blusas, faldas, pantalones) y enseres ollas, sartenes, cacerolas, cucharas, para salir a ofrecer a los clientes, esta compra le permitir tener mercadera necesaria para satisfacer la demanda. El sueo de l es tener su propia casa, ya que por el momento vive donde los suegros, tambin tener xito en sus ventas para poder lograr el sueo, de este modo confortar la vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Francisco sells clothes and household products. He lives with his family, his wife and his two children, who are financially dependent on him. It was his own decision to start his business. He has been buying and selling since he was young. He does not work fixed hours.
Francisco currently needs working capital. He is requesting a loan to invest in merchandise such as clothes (blouses, skirts and pants) and household products such as pots, skillets, pans and spoons to sell to his customers. This purchase will enable him to have the merchandise he needs to meet demand.
Francisco's dream is to own his own home since right now he lives with his in-laws. He would also like to be successful in his sales so that he can achieve his dream and thereby make his family's life more comfortable.

loan.use: to buy clothes (blouses, skirts and pants) and household products (pots, skillets, pans and spoons)

loan.name: Doris Sabina

texts.es: Doris, vive con su esposo y un hijo, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, aprendi de su madre a prepararlas, trabajan juntas y su horario es de 9:00am a 2:00pm. Ella est solicitando un prstamo para la compra de maz, lea, gas, bolsas plsticas y cal, todos estos materiales son muy necesarios para realizar las ventas diariamente. Su aspiracin es aumentar la clientela, que pueda crecer en las ventas, para generar los ingresos que cubran los gastos del hogar y le permitan ahorrar para comprarse su propia casa, donde puedan vivir con su familia.
texts.en:
Doris lives with her husband and son. Her business is selling tortillas. She learned how to prepare tortillas from her mother and the two of them work together. Their work hours are 9.00am to 2.00pm.
Doris is requesting a loan to buy corn, firewood, gas, plastic bags and lime. All these materials are essential to her in making her daily sales.
Doris' aspiration is to increase her number of customers so that she can increase her sales. This will enable her to make the income she needs to cover her household expenses and also allow her to save up to buy her own home where she can live with her family.

loan.use: to buy corn, firewood, gas, plastic bags and lime

loan.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana vende de todo un poco, usted puede encontrar en su negocio, calzado, ropa, perfumes y hasta medicina natural y tambin asesora en como consumirla, porque ella est muy bien formada en ese tema. Ana vive en el barrio Ciudadela 20 de Julio, con su cnyuge tambien comerciante y pensionado de una empresas y sus dos hijos en las edades de 20 y 25 aos, uno de ellos estudia diseo grfico y el mayor trabaja en una empresa. Desde muy joven Ana es comerciante pues lo aprendi de su padre a sus 17 aos de edad, por eso ahora en su negocios le va muy bien, tiene como a sus principales clientes, personal de oficinas, empleados bancarios, vecinos, familiares y permanentemente tiene referidos de sus mejores clientes, que con su vocacin natural de servicio conquista, logrando convertirlos en clientes fijos. Ana en su negocio trabaja 7 horas diarias de lunes a sbados, vende principalmente a crdito y compra de contado de acuerdo a su recuperacin de cartera. En el sector objetivo de su mercado, tiene una gran competencia que constantemente invaden a sus clientes con todo tipo de ofertas, pero ellos la prefieren por la calidad de su servicio y el cumplimiento en los pedidos, adems de manejar unos muy buenos precios. En la actualidad est aplicando a su primer financiamiento a travs de la lnea credikiva, con el cual comprar en mayor volumen y sobre pedidos: calzado de caballero y perfume principalmente porque para el da del padre, estos sern los regalos que sus clientes han encargado para ofrecerle un detalle a sus progenitores a propsito de esta fecha. Su meta ms adelante es tener un punto comercial de los perfumes que traen los catlogos, porque as tendrn sus clientes acceso a muchas ofertas ms oportunamente. Mientras Ana construye sus sueos, continua trabajando en su negocio que le ofrece una rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menor de un 34% y que aspira a incrementar gradualmente.
texts.en:
Ana sells a little bit of everything. In her business, you will find footwear, clothes, perfumes and even natural medicines. You will also find advice about how to take them as she is very well trained in this area. Ana lives in Ciudadela 20 de Julio neighborhood with her husband, who is also a salesperson and receives a pension from a private company, and their two children aged 20 and 25. One of their children is studying graphic design and their eldest works for a company.
Ana has been a saleswoman since she was very young: she learned the business from her father when she was 17 years old. For this reason, her business is doing very well. Her main customers are office staff, bank employees, neighbors and family members. She permanently receives referrals from her best customers. With her natural vocation for service and achievement, she manages to turn these into regular customers. Ana works in her business for 7 hours a day, from Monday to Saturday. She mainly sells on credit and buys for cash, in accordance with the recovery of her portfolio.
She has a lot of competitors in her sector of the market who are constantly bombarding her customers with all kinds of offers. However, her customers are loyal to her business as she offers good customer service and always fills her orders. In addition, she offers very good prices.
Ana is currently applying for her first loan through Kiva. She will use the money to buy goods in greater quantities and fill orders - mainly for men's footwear and perfumes for Fathers Day. These are the products that her customers have ordered so that they can offer a gift to their fathers on that day.
Ana's future goal is to have a sales location for the perfumes that she orders from catalogs so that her customers have access to a lot more offers at just the right time. While Ana builds her dreams, she continues working in her business which has a return on sales of no less than 34%. She aspires to increase this gradually.

loan.use: to buy products in larger quantities, to fill orders (men's footwear and perfumes)

loan.name: Jesus Antonio

texts.es: Jess, es un agricultor, vive con su esposa y tienen 3 hijos de 21, 18 y 13 aos de edad, tienen casa propia y su trabajo es la siembra de chile y maz, tiene muchos aos de realizar estos cultivos ya que a travs de l ha podido sostener a su familia. Por el momento Jess iniciara el cultivo de maz y chile, por lo que solicita un prstamo para la compra de abono, tratamiento para plagas y 1,500 plantas de chile, con esta compra est listo para iniciar los cultivos, y que espera sean sanos y den buena cosecha. Esta ayuda le beneficiara para realizar su trabajo, dar un cuido adecuado y con la esperanza que la produccin sea abundante.
texts.en:
Jess is a farmer. He lives with his wife and they have three children aged 21, 18 and 13. They own their own home. Jess' work is growing chili and corn. He has been growing these crops for many years and, through his work, he has managed to support his family.
Right now, Jess is about to start growing his corn and chilis. He is requesting a loan so that he can buy fertilizers, pest treatments and 1,500 chili plants. With this purchase, he will be ready to start growing. He hopes that his plants will be healthy and provide him with a good harvest.
This help will benefit Jess and allow him to carry out his work, caring properly for his crops and hoping that he will enjoy an abundant harvest.

loan.use: to buy fertilizers, pest treatments and 1,500 chili plants

loan.name: Cielo I Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "CIELO I", est integrado por 9 clientas, se encuentran ubicados en el Estado de Mxico. en este grupo se encuentra la seora Yolanda de 36 aos de edad, tiene 4 hijos: 2 hombres y 2 mujeres, nos platica que estudi hasta el tercer ao de secundaria, actualmente se desempea como diseadora de ropa, oficio que adquiri por cuenta propia, tiene un pequeo taller de costura que inici hace aproximadamente 10 aos, decidi poner su negocio de costura para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos familiares. Solicita el prestamo para la compra de materia prima como son: telas, hilos, costuras, etc. Las ganancias que obtenga lo utilizar para la construccin de su casa y renovar el mobiliario y equipo de su taller, adems de cubrir los gastos escolares de sus 4 hijos.
texts.en: This group is called "CIELO I" [Heaven I]. It is made up of 9 clients. They are located in the state of Mxico. Yolanda is in this group. She is 36 years old and has 4 children, 2 boys and 2 girls. She tells us that she went to school until the third year of secondary school. At this time, she works as a clothes designer. She learned this trade on her own and has a small sewing workshop that she started approximately 10 years ago. She decided to open her sewing business to help her husband with the household expenses. She is asking for the loan to buy materials such as: fabric, thread, etc.She will use the earnings she makes to build her house and renovate the furniture equipment in her workshop, in addition to covering the school expenses of her 4 children.

loan.use: to buy fabric and thread for her sewing business

loan.name: Sergia

texts.es: Sergia, de 28 aos, es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Daniel de 35 aos y sus 02 queridos hijos, Kiara de 06 aos y Edson de 06 meses de nacido a quienes desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Con mucho ahnco Sergia ha logrado trabajar sus tierras y volverlas muy productivas, ella cultiva cacao, caf y palillo, productos que tiene mucha demanda y que son llevados a vender en los centros de acopio situado en la ciudad de San Francisco, donde percibe ganancias considerables. Sus cultivos le han dado los ingresos necesarios para mantenerse y poder cubrir los gastos educativos de su querido hijo; es por ello que pone todas sus ganas en que sean productivas sus tierras. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus plantas de la plaga de insectos, ya que se siente muy feliz hacindolo. Lleva 08 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta su comunidad que es un recorrido de 01 hora de caminata, pero sabe que todo esfuerzo tiene su recompensa. Ahora lo que mayor prioridad tiene es comprar estircol de animales para fertilizar sus sembros, as asegura una buena cosecha. Por tal razn pide el apoyo de todos ustedes para que pueda concretar sus planes. Espera en un futuro comprar tierras para incrementar su produccin. Este ser su noveno crdito con MFP, y manifiesta que ha sido muy puntual en los pagos de sus anteriores crditos y espera serlo tambin ahora. En su banco comunal es una socia muy participativa. Con el crdito comprar estircol de animales para fertilizar sus tierras y sacar buen provecho de los frutos posteriormente.
texts.en:
Sergia, age 28, is a hardworking woman. She lives in her own home with her partner Daniel, age 35, and their two beloved children, Kiara (age 6) and Edson (age 6 months), for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life. Sergia works diligently on her land so that it will yield productive returns. She grows cacao, coffee, and turmeric. These products are in great demand. She takes her harvest to the collection centers located in the city of San Francisco, where she is able to generate considerable earnings. Her crops provide her with the necessary income to support her family and pay for her childs educational expenses. For this reason, Sergia does all she can to make her land productive. What she enjoys most about her work is protecting her crops against plagues of insects, and she is willing to do whatever it takes. Sergia has been farming for eight years and considers the most difficult part to be transporting her products from the field to her community. This journey requires one hour of walking, but she knows that she will be rewarded for all of her efforts. Now her greatest priority is to buy animal manure for fertilizing her crops, which will ensure a good harvest. For this reason, she asks for all the help she can get so that she can follow through with her plans. In the future, she hopes to buy more land so that she can increase production.
This will be her ninth loan with MFP. Sergia says that she repaid her previous loans on time and hopes to do the same now. She is an active participant in her Communal Bank. With this loan, she will buy animal manure for fertilizing her land. She hopes to earn a good profit from the fruits that will eventually be harvested.

loan.use: to purchase animal manure for fertilizing her land.

loan.name: Ricardo Antonio

texts.es: Ricardo, vive con su esposa, no tienen hijos y solamente l trabaja en un taller de zapatera el cual posee desde hace 30 aos, trabaja en el mercado municipal, su horario es de 7:00am a 2:00pm. Actualmente necesita un prstamo para invertirlo en hule, hilos, suelas, tacones, pega y ms materiales que son necesarios para la reparacin y elaboracin de zapatos, teniendo todos estos materiales atender mejor a los clientes. Para Ricardo el sueo ha sido instalar un taller amplio, con ms capacidad, que sea ms concurrido y ofrecer trabajo de calidad, as tener una mejor solvencia econmica para l y su esposa.
texts.en:
Ricardo lives with his wife. They do not have any children and he works alone in his shoe workshop which he has owned for 30 years. He works in the town market, from 7.00am to 2.00pm.
Ricardo currently needs a loan to invest in buying rubber, thread, soles, heels, glue and other materials which he needs to repair and make shoes. With all of these materials available, he will be able to better serve his customers.
Ricardo's dream has been to set up a spacious workshop, with more capacity, which is busier and allows him to offer good-quality work to his customers. This would allow him and his wife to enjoy better economic solvency.

loan.use: to buy rubber, thread, soles, heels and glue

loan.name: Allin Llankaquna Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Allin Llankaquna y se van a reunir cada treinta das en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco, Per). El banco comunal se distingue por estar conformado por gente trabajadora, agricultores, artesanos, comerciantes y ganaderos. El grupo est conformado por nueve integrantes y es la primera vez que solicitan un prstamo de la Asociacin Arariwa y invertirn el dinero para mejorar sus negocios.
En esta reunin conocimos a la seora Jess y nos cuenta que naci en la ciudad de Quiquijana a 3 horas de la ciudad de Urubamba. Actualmente, Jess vive en la ciudad de Urubamba junto con su pareja y sus cuatro hijos. Desde nia sus padres le ensearan el trabajo del campo y ahora que es mayor trabaja de forma independiente alquilando chacras para cultivar flores y verduras. Inici su negocio hace cuatro aos y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone en su trabajo. Ella cultiva flores como claveles, gladiolas y en otras oportunidades verduras como perejil, ruda y hierba buena. Ella en esta oportunidad requiere el prstamo para comprar ms semillas y abono. Ella tiene 48 aos, es una persona con muchas ganas de superarse y tener un negocio exitoso da con da, siempre con el deseo de brindarle lo mejor a su familia. El sueo de la Seora Jess es poder exportar sus flores bonitas a otras ciudades.
texts.en:
The name of this group is Allin Llankaquna. They meet every month in the city of Urubamba (Cusco, Per). This communal bank distinguishes itself by being comprised of hard-working people, farmers, craftsmen, merchants, and ranchers. The group is comprised of nine members. This is the first time they have requested a loan with the Asociacin Arariwa. They will use the money to improve their businesses.
We met Jess at this meeting. She tells us that she was born in the city of Quiquijana, which is three hours from the city of Urubamba. Jess currently lives in the city of Urubamba with her husband and their four children. When she was a child her parents taught her field work. Now that she is an adult, she works independently. She rents small farms to cultivate flowers and greens.
She started her business four years ago. It is going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work. She grows flowers like carnations and gladiolas. At other times she grows greens like parsley, rue, and mint.
She now needs a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer. She is 48 years old. She is a person with a great desire to succeed and to have a successful business day after day. She always wishes to give the best to her family.
Jess dream is to be able to export beautiful flowers to other cities.

loan.use: to buy more seeds and fertilizer.

loan.name: Gisela Elizabeth

texts.es: Gisela is a 24-year old married mother of a six-month old baby. Approximately six years ago, she started to sell used clothing door-to-door to help support her mother. Now with her own family, Gisela has continued the business to help provide additional income. Her dream is to one day have her own clothing store. The proceeds of loan will be used to refresh her inventory of clothes to sell and ultimately grow her business.
texts.en: Gisela is a 24-year old married mother of a six-month old baby. Approximately six years ago, she started to sell used clothing door-to-door to help support her mother. Now with her own family, Gisela has continued the business to help provide additional income. Her dream is to one day have her own clothing store. The proceeds of loan will be used to refresh her inventory of clothes to sell and ultimately grow her business.

loan.use: to refresh her inventory of clothes to sell and ultimately grow her business

loan.name: Raymundo

texts.es: Raymundo tiene 28 aos de edad, natural de la ciudad de Quimbiri, convive con Raquel de 20 aos y juntos residen en su propia casa con su querida hija Mariana de 02 aos de edad a quien desean brindarle un mejor porvenir. La labor que realiza Raymundo es labrar la tierra, l posee 03 hectreas de terreno, ah cultiva cacao, caf, achiote y palillo. Cuando era nio, sus padres le ensearon a remover la tierra y a la edad de 20 aos compr su propia parcela, desde entonces trabajando en ellas. Cuando es temporada de limpiar sus campos y sacar la maleza necesita de jornaleros, asimismo cuando es temporada de cosecha. Se siente muy comprometido con su trabajo, porque gracias a su esfuerzo hoy disfruta al ver que sus plantas son productivas, logrando obtener ganancias. Sin embargo cuando es invierno no es de su agrado porque son pocas donde abunda mayor cantidad de precipitaciones de lluvia, estropeando los brotes de sus plantas. Por tal pide de su apoyo para que pueda intensificarse en esta actividad. Este es su quinto crdito con MFP; esta dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crdito ms adelante. En su banco comunal es un socio muy participe. Con el crdito solicitado comprar sacos de abono y semillas de rboles maderables, como: Caoba, Tornillo y Cedro, para as mejorar sus tierras y con los rboles maderables contribuir con la naturaleza por que los rboles nos dan vida; es el lema que emplea al sembrar rboles.
texts.en:
Raymundo, 28, is from the city of Quimbiri. He lives with Raquel, 20, in their own home with their darling daughter Mariana, 2, who they want to give a better future. Raymundo works the land. He has 3 hectares of land where he grows cacao, coffee, annatto, and palillo [similar to a guava tree]. When he was young, his parents taught him to turn over the land and at age 20 he bought his first parcel of land, which he has worked on since. He hires day laborers when it's time to clean his fields and get rid of the brush and also for the harvest. He feels very committed to his work, because thanks to his efforts today he enjoys seeing that his plants are productive and he is earning money. However he doesn't like the winter because there are periods with a great deal of rain, which ruins his plant shoots.
For this reason he asks for your help so that he can intensify his work This is his fifth loan with MFP. He is ready to make all of his payments punctually, because he wants to access another loan in the future. He is a very participatory member of his village bank. With the loan he requested he will buy sacks of manure and seeds for hardwood trees like mahogany, tornillo [screwbean mesquite] and cedar so that he can improve his lands. The hardwood trees will also contribute to nature because they give us life; that's the motto that he uses when planting trees.

loan.use: to buy sacks of compost and mahogany, cedar and screwbean mesquite seeds.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy replacement parts for his motorcycle shop and to buy sewing materials like thread, fabric, and buttons.

loan.name: Ana Julia

texts.en: Ana Julia is 32 years old and married with two children, ages 5 and 12. She owns a small bodega where she sells various snacks, drinks, food, and other household items. Ana is very thankful for the support she has received via previous loans, as her business has grown substantially. The loan proceeds will be used to replace inventory and buy additional products for her store. Her goal is to continue to expand her business and, by doing so, help provide for her family.

loan.use: to replace inventory and buy additional products for her store snacks, drinks, food, candies, cookies

loan.name: Jose Yoel Bladimir

texts.es: Jos, se dedica a instalar cielos falsos, aprendi el oficio por un amigo, hoy da trabaja en lo propio, no tiene un horario fijo, y ya posee experiencia. Vive con su esposa y dos hijos quienes dependen econmicamente de l. Actualmente necesita invertir en materiales como la compra de losetas, aluminio, vidrio, estos materiales son los que utiliza a diario para ejecutar su trabajo, por lo que esta compra es muy importante para Jos que le permita trabajar para los clientes atendiendo las demandas. El sueo de l es montar un negocio grande, con mucha demanda, clientes satisfechos con la calidad y aportar para su familia todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Jos installs suspended ceilings. He learned this trade from a friend, and now he works on his own. He does not have a fixed schedule, and he does have experience. He lives with his wife and two children who are economically dependent upon him.
He now needs to buy materials like tiles, aluminum, and glass. These are the materials he uses every day in order to do his work. That is why these purchases are very important for Jos. They allow him to take care of his customers demands.
His dream is to put together a large business with great demand and customers who are satisfied with the quality he provides. He also wants to give his family everything they need.

loan.use: to buy tiles, aluminum, and glass.

loan.name: Israel

texts.es: Israel, tiene 26 aos de edad, es un joven que se dedica a la siembra de caf, a su corta edad ya es todo un experto en la siembras, el es originario de Pueblo Nuevo municipio de Estel, es soltero . El inicio esta actividad hace 10 aos este oficio se le enseo su padre, quien lo ha venido entrenando en el negocio de siembra y compra- venta de ganado. Hace 6 aos es Israel quien se encarga de dirigir la crianza de animales y de las siembras ya que su padre tiene 80 aos y ya no puede trabajar con el en la finca. El solicito el prstamo para sembrar 1 manzana de caf orgnico y cubrir costos de produccin tales como pago de mano de obra, compra de abono, insumos y plantas de caf. El espera sacar una produccin con altos rendimientos, desea poder vender a un buen precio su caf directamente al mercado que le ofrezca una buena oferta, as dar a conocer su producto. Su prxima meta es mejorar la calidad de sus reses para sacar una buena produccin de leche, hacerles mejoras a la finca.
texts.en:
Israel is 26 years old. He is a young man whose business is growing coffee. At his young age, he is already a real expert in growing his crops. He is from Pueblo Nuero, in Estel and is single. Israel started out in this business ten years ago. His father taught him the trade and trained him in the business of growing crops and also buying and selling livestock.
For six years now, Israel has been in charge of raising his animals and growing his crops since his father is 80 years old and can no longer work with him on the farm. He is requesting this loan so that he can sow one 'manzana' (1.68 acres) with organic coffee and cover production costs such as paying laborers and buying manure, supplies and coffee plants. He hopes to receive a high yield from his crops and would like to be able to sell his coffee directly on the market for a good price. This will enable him to make his product known. His next goal is to improve the quality of his cattle so that he can enjoy a good milk production and make some improvements to his farm.

loan.use: to sow one 'manzana' (1.68 acres) with organic coffee and to cover production costs such as paying laborers and buying manure, supplies and coffee plants

loan.name: Miguel

texts.es: Miguel de 40 aos, natural de la ciudad de Quimbiri; esta casado con Teodosia de 40 aos y fruto de aquel amor concibieron 03 hijos y viven en su propia casa situado en la comunidad de Bethel; anexo del distrito de Quimbiri. Miguel, es el sostn de su familia. Desde muy nio sus padres le inculcaron a trabajar en la chacra, hoy es campesino y cuenta con 04 hectreas de terreno, en donde cultiva caf y cacao, plantas oriundas de la zona selvtica del Valle Ro Apurimac. Viene trabajando 15 aos en sus propias tierras y en tiempo de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros, de esa manera avanza con mayor rapidez la extraccin de sus frutos. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar ya que puede ver la recompensa de lo cosechado y esto es gracias a tanto meses de arduo trabajo. Considera que lo ms difcil es transportar sus granos desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio ubicados en la ciudad de san francisco; lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus productos. Si embargo el no tener suficiente capital para invertir y pagar por adelantado a los jornaleros; es por ello que acude a los prstamos que facilita la institucin MFP y por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para que pueda invertir en su negocio. Por ahora lo que ms prioriza es sembrar ms plantas de cacao ya que cuenta con 01 hectrea ms de terreno por cultivar. Este ser su cuarto crdito con MFP, siente que este aporte le ayudar mucho en el progreso de su trabajo. En su banco comunal es un socio muy querido por el resto de sus compaeros, ya que es muy solidario con ellos. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles solicitados, contratar jornaleros para que le brinden el apoyo en las cosechas de caf y cacao ya que estos productos estn en temporadas de cosecha.
texts.en:
Miguel, 40, is from the city of Quimbiri. He's married to Teodosia, 40, with whom he has 3 children. They live in their own home in the community of Bethel, next to the disrict of Quimbiri. Miguel is the breadwinner in his family. Since he was a young child his parents taught him to work on the farm. Now he is a farmer and has 4 hectares of land where he grows coffee and cacao, native plants to the Apurimac River Valley forests. He has worked on his own land for 15 years, and at harvest time he has help from day laborers so that he can gather the fruit more quickly. What he likes most about his job is the harvest, since he can see the the returns from his many months of hard work. He thinks the hardest part of his job is transporting his grains from the field to the storage centers located in the city of San Francisco, which is where they offer the best prices for his products.
He doesn't have enough money to invest and pay the day laborers ahead of time, which is why he comes to MFP for a loan. He hopes that with the support of each one of you he will be able to invest in his business. Right now his greatest priority is planting more cacao since he has another hectare of land to cultivate.
This will be his 4th loan with MFP. He thinks this support will help him to progress a lot in his work. With the 1,500 nuevos soles requested, he will contract day laborers to provide support in harvesting coffee and cacao since it's harvest time.

loan.use: to hire day laborers to help harvest his fruit.

loan.name: Trabajando En Armonia Group

texts.es: El seor MElaneo P. es natural D. Chiclayo tiene 65 aos y es soltero desD. muy joven se a dedicado a la pesca ya que toda su familia es pescadora. El se dedica a pescar y luego venD. todo su pescado es el puerto. Viaja por lo general los fines D. semana, y durante la semana se dedica a la cerrajeria realiza ventanas y puertas en fierro a pedido. Su deseo mas granD. es poder terminar D. construir su propia casa. Con su prestamo se va a comprar un bote D. segunda para poder salir a la pesca y tambien para poder alquilarlo.
texts.en:
Melaneo is a native of Chiclayo, 65 years old, and single. From a very early age, he has dedicated his time to fishing, as has all his family. He still fishes and sells his catch in the port. On weekends, he goes out to fish, and during the week, he does ironwork, fulfilling orders for customized iron gratings for windows and doors.
His greatest desire is to be able to finish constructing his own house. With this loan, he will buy a second-hand boat to fish in and, also, to rent out.

loan.use: to invest in buying a fishing boat.

loan.name: Cazadoras Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama "Cazadoras" esta ubicado en el estado de Mxico, esta conformado por 11 integrantes entre ellas la seora Rita, ella nos platica que desde los quince aos comenzo a vender con su mama tamales, tortillas y quesadillas, ms adelante emprendio su propio negocio vendiendo comida guisados y algunos antojitos mexicanos. Ella quiere el prestamo para rentar un local y as hacer crecer su negocio; dar una mejor atencion a sus clientes y sea ms saludable. Nos comenta que anhela seguir pidiendo prestamo para invertirlo en su negocio ya que tiene muchos clientes y aveces no puede atenderlos a todos con la calidad que ellos merece y posteriormente comprar su propio local. Tambien desea contribuir con los gastos de su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The group is called Cazadoras (Huntresses) and is located in the State of Mxico. It has 11 members among whom is Rita. She tells us that she started selling tamales, tortillas and quesadillas with her mother fifteen years ago. Later on, she ventured into a business of her own selling dishes and some Mexican snacks.
She wants a loan to rent a locale so that her business can grow and she can provide better service and it can be more healthy. She comments that shed like to continue asking for loans to invest in her business because she has many customers but sometimes can tend to all of them with the quality they deserve and later on buy a locale of her own. She also wants to contribute to meeting family expenses and to improve their quality of life.

loan.use: to rent a locale for her food business.

loan.name: Luz
