Su deseo adorado como toda madre es poder ver a su hijo profesional pero a la vez ella desea poder tener una zapateria en donD. pueda vender diversidad D. calzados. El prestamo lo invirtio para la compra D. productos D. belleza y stockearse ya que viene campaa por el dia del padre.
texts.en: Meri is 27 years old, single, and has one son. She's enjoyed working from a young age to help her family. At the moment, she works selling beauty products. She got into the business through a neighbor, who sold to her and encouraged her to begin selling. Like every mother, her fondest wish is to see her son grow up to be successful, but she'd also like to have a shoe store where she could sell all kinds of shoes. She is using this loan to purchase beauty products and restock, since she'll be selling more for Father's Day.

loan.use: to purchase cosmetics for resale

loan.name: Eulogia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY TIKA; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Eulogia; ella tiene 37 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de frutas como naranjas, pltanos, mandarinas y entre otras frutas, ella lo distribuye la fruta al por mayor en el mercado de Urubamba, la socia tambin tiene un terreno de cultivo donde siembra caf y pltano y tambin lo vende en el distrito de Urubamba, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de frutas. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar frutas al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Eulogia is a member of the "Munay Tika" community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.
Eulogia is 37 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling fruit such as oranges, bananas and mandarins. She distributes her fruit wholesale in Urubamba market. Eulogia also has a plot of land where she grows coffee and bananas which she sells in Urubamba district. She would like to expand her fruit business and is requesting this loan to buy fruit wholesale.
Eulogia is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy fruit wholesale

loan.name: Ayudanos Seor 6 Group

texts.en:
Sandra is the coordinator of her group Ayudanos Seor 6 (Help Us Lord 6). Her group is located in the rural area surrounding La Romana, where it is common to see sugar cane fields around the communities. Sandra makes her home in a simple structure where she lives with her long-term partner and their two children. She is a very hardworking woman who is committed to her plans to change her familys life and provide better living conditions, a better house, and a good education for her children.
Sandra is excited to be taking her first loan with Esperanza. She runs a small business stand in her house and she will use her loan to purchase shoes, clothes, cosmetics, and accessories to sell. She plans to re-invest her profits into her business.
Sandras long-term goal is to improve her house and business with good savings and a stable source of income. With this loan and the blessing of God, she is very sure to do this.

loan.use: to buy shoes, clothes, cosmetics, and accessories to sell

loan.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY TIKA; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Sonia; ella tiene 28 aos de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de docente del nivel inicial, ella ensea a nios de 3,4 y 5 aos de edad en el distrito de Urubamba, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar en su trabajo como profesora y tambin quiere terminar de construir su casa. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar materiales de construccin como maylicas, cemento y arena.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sonia is a member of the "Munay Tika" community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.
Sonia is 28 years old, married, and has two children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her work as a teacher. She teaches children aged 3, 4 and 5, in Urubamba district. Through her work, Sonia gets her own children ahead in life. She would like to improve in her work as a teacher and would also like to finish building her house. She is requesting this loan to buy construction supplies such as 'maiolicas' (glazed, ceramic tiles), cement and sand.
Sonia is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy construction supplies such as 'maiolica' (glazed, ceramic tiles), cement and sand

loan.name: Elia

texts.es: Elia tiene 38 aos, vive con sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Hace ms de 20 aos se dedica a agricultura y ganadera, sin embargo no le era suficiente, por ello opt hace 10 aos tener un negocio adicional, que es la venta de lea, actividad que lo realiza dentro de los espacios de su casa. Para ello cuenta con una sierra elctrica, para que pueda cortar los troncos de madera que compra y que luego son vendidos a sus vecinos o clientes que le solicitan. Es as como se gana la vida, permitindole tener los ingresos cada semana y con ello puede cubrir las necesidades de su familia; adems puede invertir en las anteriores actividades, como la agricultura y ganadera, pero por el momento desea incrementar de ms lea para vender, por ello pide de su ayuda para que pueda continuar con su trabajo. Este ser su crdito nmero 3 con MFP, eso la motivar a esforzarse ms en sus ventas y tener seguridad el tener un respaldo financiero, por ello se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el crdito solicitado, invertir en la compra de ms troncos de madera.
texts.en:
Elia, 38 years old, lives with her three children in her own house. For over 20 years she has been farming and working with livestock. However, this was not enough for her. Ten years ago she opted to have an additional business selling firewood. She does this in the space behind her her house.
To do this she has an electric saw so that she is able to cut the wood logs that she buys. She then sells them to her neighbors or to customers who request them. That is how she earns a living, which allows her to have income every week. With this income she is able to cover the family necessities. She is also able to invest in her business activities mentioned above like farming and livestock.
Now she wishes to have more firewood to sell. That is why she is asking for your help to be able to continue working. This will be her third loan with MFP. This will encourage her to work more in her sales, and it will give her the security of financial support. She pledges to make her payments on time. She will use the requested loan to buy more wood logs.

loan.use: to buy wood logs.

loan.name: Biviana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY TIKA; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Biviana; ella tiene 50 aos de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y tambin en su tienda de abarrotes vende verduras como cebollas, tomates, zanahorias, papa entre otras verduras, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azcar, aceite y leche al por mayor y tambin para comprar verduras.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Biviana, 50, is a member of the MUNAY TIKA communal bank which is located in Urubamba District belonging to Urubamba Province and Cusco Department.
She is married and has four children. She alternates her daily chores with a grocery store where she also sells vegetables like onions, tomatoes, carrots and potatoes, among other vegetables. She works from 6am until 10pm and supports her children with this work. She wants to expand the grocery store and is asking for a loan to buy stock items for it like: rice, sugar, oil and milk at wholesale and also to buy vegetables.
She is happy about the loan and commits to pay her installments.

loan.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loan.name: Kattia Maria

texts.es: Kattia Mara M. Q., tiene 43 aos de edad, es madre soltera ella vive con sus dos hijos menores de edad, la seora tuvo que abandonar la secundaria por motivo de que tena que trabajar para generar ingresos en su hogar, es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable. La seora ha sido clienta de fundacin en dos ocasiones ella en los anteriores ha mantenido una excelente moral de pago, los crdito anteriores tambin fueron para fortalecer su capital de trabajo Con este crdito la seora Kattia piensa invertir en la compra de mercadera para su peluquera, ya que viene das festivos del ao y necesita tener surtido su negocio La seora tiene ms de 20 aos de dedicarse al negocio, ella tiene una peluquera ella empez con haciendo manicure y poco a poco fue capacitndose en belleza, tiene una peluquera en San Jos centro, desde hace mas de 15 aos alquila el local, donde se encuentra ubicado es un buen punto. Kattia nos cuenta que se levanta temprano, hace las labores domesticas, y despus se va a trabajar y regresa hasta las siete de la noche, hace la cena y les ayuda a sus hijos a ser la tarea, sus hijos se los cuida su mam, Kattia nos cuenta que ella desea tener un carro para transportarse a su negocio. Con este crdito la seora podr tener ms capital de trabajo para fortalecer su negocio y poder cumplir su objetivo
texts.en:
Kattia Mara M. Q., 43, is a single mother living with her two minor children. She had to drop out of secondary school because she had to earn money for her household. She is a very hard working, responsible person.
She has been a client of the Fundacin on two previous occasions and she kept an excellent payment behavior in both of them. The past loans were also to strengthen her working capital.
Kattia wants to use this loan to buy merchandise for her beauty salon because annual holidays are approaching and she wants to have it well stocked.
Shes been in business for over 20 years. She has a beauty salon. She started out doing manicures and gradually trained in beauty. She has had a beauty salon that she rents in downtown San Jos for over 15 years; its located in a good spot.
Kattia tells us that she rises early, does her domestic chores and then goes to work. She returns home at 7pm, prepares dinner and helps her children with their homework. Her mother babysits the children. Kattia tells us that shed like to have a car to get to work. With this loan, shell have more working capital to strengthen her business and meet her objective.

loan.use: to buy merchandise and supplies for her beauty salon.

loan.name: Mariposas Group

texts.es:
Las Mariposas es un grupo solidario de Credituyo compuesto por 8 mujeres que esta en su primer ciclo. Ellas pusieron este nombre al grupo simple y sencillamente, porque les gustan las mariposas. La mayoria de las mujeres de este grupo son comerciantes y se dedican a la venta de diversos productos como ropa, zapatos, perfumes, joyas, y snacks.
Aurelia es una de las integrantes del grupo. La seora Aurelia tiene 66 aos y 5 hijos. Todos sus hijos son trabajadores y trabajan como albailes, en talleres mecanicos y como secretarias. Aurelia solia tener un puesto de hamburguesas que administraba junto con su esposo. Sin embargo, su esposo falleci recientemente y mantener el negocio abierto fue muy complicado para ella sola, sobre todo a causa de su diabetes. Es por eso que Aurelia decidi habilitar un cuarto de su casa para comenzar alli un negocio de snacks. En este actualmente solo vende tostadas, duritos y bollos (freezy pops). Con su crdito quiere comprar una olla electrica para derretir queso asi como los insumos necesarios para comenzar a vender nachos con queso as como otras frituras y botanas que son preparadas comunmente con queso derretido en la regin.
texts.en:
Las Mariposas (The Butterflies) is a communal bank in Credituyo composed of 8 women; its in its first cycle. They chose this simple name simply because they like butterflies. Most of the women in this group are merchants and sell a variety of products like clothes, shoes, perfume, jewelry and snacks.
Aurelia is one of the members of the group. She is 66 years old and has 5 children. All her children work; some as bricklayers, others work in repair shops and as secretaries. Aurelia used to have a hamburger stand that she ran with her husband. However, her husband passed away recently and keeping the business going by herself was very difficult for her, especially because of her diabetes.
Because of this, Aurelia decided to refurbish a room in her house to start selling snacks. Currently she only sells tostadas, duritos (crispy fried dough) and bollos (freezy pops). She wants to use the loan to buy an electric pot to melt cheese as well as the necessary ingredients to start selling nachos with cheese and other fried food items and regional snacks that are commonly made with melted cheese.

loan.use: to buy utensils and merchandise for her business.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to pay for maintaining her sewing machines.

loan.name: Maria Ines

texts.es: Mara, es casada, vive con su esposo y una hija la cual es enfermera, se dedica a la agricultura, desD. hace 11 aos junto a su esposo trabajan sembrando maz y frijol, cultivan una parte en terreno propio y otra parte alquilan. Ella solicita un prstamo para comprar abono, fertilizantes y tratamiento para plagas, esta inversin le ayudara para iniciar la siembra con todos los cuidados necesarios, con la esperanza D. lograr una buena cosecha. Para Mara como cada ao, su objetivo es tener una buena siembra, cultivar y producir, tiene tambin el proyecto D. arreglar su vivienda pero dentro D. algn tiempo.
texts.en:
Mara is married living with her husband and a daughter who is a nurse. She is a farmer. For the last 11 years she and her husband have worked planting corn and beans. They grow part of it on their own field and another part on leased land.
She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer, manure and insecticiD.. This investment will help her start the planting with all necessary care hoping to get a good crop yield.
For Mara, like every year, her goal is to attain a good planting, to cultivate and to produce. She also has a project involving home repairs but thats for a little later on.

loan.use: to buy manure, fertilizer and insecticide.

loan.name: Xiomara Yeskeli

texts.es: Xiomara, es madre de tres hijos de 5, 9 y 12 aos, vive con su esposo y se dedica a la venta de pupusas, administra una tienda, tambin vende frutas en una escuela y su esposo es agricultor, actualmente l iniciara la siembra de maz, para ello necesita comprar abono y fertilizantes. Xiomara solicita el prstamo que dar uso el esposo comprando los insumos que necesita para el cultivo, pagando mano de obra para preparar la tierra. El objetivo de ella es tener una fuente de ingreso ms por eso apoya a su esposo en el rea agrcola, ya que juntos velan por las necesidades de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Xiomara is the mother of three children who are 5, 9 and 12 years old. She lives with her husband and sells pupusas (typical Salvadoran fast food), runs a store and also sells fruit at a school. Her husbands a farmer. He is about to start the new corn planting and needs to buy manure and fertilizer.
Xiomara is asking for the loan that shell give to her husband for the necessary supplies he needs for the crops and to pay labor costs to prepare the soil.
Her goal is to have another source of income and thats why she helps out her husband in the agricultural area because they watch over their childrens needs together.

loan.use: to buy manure and fertilizer and also to pay labor costs.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy manure, fertilizer and insecticide.

loan.name: Silvia Carmelina

texts.es: Silvia, est casada, vive con dos hijos D. 19 y 23 aos D. edad, se dedica a la venta D. productos D. primera necesidad, tiene 6 aos D. tener el negocio y lo fund junto a sus hijos, lo atienD. D. 6:00am a 7:00pm. Ella actualmente necesita un prstamo para comprar arroz, frijol, azcar, aceite, huevos, embutidos y pastas. Esta compra le ayudara para abastecer el negocio y mantener a disponibilidad D. los clientes. El objetivo D. Silvia es mantener el negocio para ayudar a su familia D. las ganancias que recibe, pues quiere para sus hijos un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Silvia is married and lives with two children who are 19 and 23 years of age. She sells basic need items and has been in business for six years. She started the business with her children and is open from 6am until 7pm.
She currently needs a loan to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, eggs, cured meats and pasta. This purchase will help her stock the store and have supplies on hand for her customers.
Silvias goal is to stay in business to help her family with the profits she earns because she wants her children to have a better future.

loan.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, eggs, cured meats and pasta.

loan.name: Mujeres De Villa Paraiso 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Luz is the coordinator of her group Mujeres de Villa Paraiso (Women of Village Paradise) 1 & 2. Her group is located in one of the neighborhoods of Los Alcarrizos, a community to the northwest of Santo Domingo.
Luz makes her home here in a simple structure except for the rainy seasons. When it rains, her area gets flooded so her most important challenge is to have a comfortable house in a better neighborhood. She lives with her husband and their two children.
Luz is excited to be taking her first loan with Esperanza. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing beans, coconut, charcoal, sugar, milk, corn and other items. She sells traditional candies such as coconut and milk, sweet beans, Chaca (sweet corn with milk), and other items. Her business profits are to save and invest in her business.
Luz is dreaming to have a depot, where she could sell different products and goods. This is the future for her business, and she will work to make it come true with the Lord's will.

loan.use: to buy beans, coconut, charcoal, sugar, corn, etc.

loan.name: Edwin Antonio

texts.es: Edwin, es soltero, vive con sus padres, se dedica a la siembra de maz y frijol, tiene varios aos de estar cultivando aprendi de su padre, tiene un horario de 6:00am a 3:00pm, en esta jornada atiende todas las demandas del terreno. El solicita un prstamo para comprar insumos agrcolas como: abono, tratamientos para plagas, y fertilizantes, esta ser una gran ayuda para Edwin, ya que al tener todo lo necesario podr iniciar la siembra y dar un buen cuido. Su objetivo es ayudar a sus padres, contribuir al desarrollo de su familia y forjar su futuro.
texts.en:
Edwin is single living with his parents. He is a corn and bean farmer. Hes been in this line of work for several years having learned it from his father. His work schedule is 6am to 3pm and during this span of time he takes care of all the lands needs.
He is asking for a loan to buy farming supplies like: manure, insecticide and fertilizer. This will be of great help to Edwin because by having everything on hand he can initiate the planting and care for it properly.
His goal is to help his parents, contribute to his familys development and forge his future.

loan.use: to buy farming supplies like manure, fertilizer and insecticide.

loan.name: Maria Isaura

texts.es: Mara, tiene 41 aos de edad, tiene tres hijos dos que an viven con ella y uno que se caso, Mara tiene un negocio de venta de frutas, con este negocio ha logrado mantener el hogar, lo tiene desde hace 5 aos, la fruta la vende en trosos ya en su bolsa, la ofrece de forma ambulante. Actualmente necesita invertir en frutas, comprando mangos, sandia, jcama, pepino, ya que no dispone de muchas frutas en el puesto, este prstamo ser una gran ayuda para ella y podr ofrecer a los clientes frutas frescas. Para Mara su nico objetivo es tener una fuente de ingreso, que le permita cubrir las necesidades del hogar y sobre todo mantener a sus hijos en condiciones optimas para que estos puedan superarse.
texts.en:
Mara is 41 years old and has three children; two still live with her and one thats already married. Mara sells fruit. Shes had the business for five years and its made it possible for her to support her home. She is a street vendor and sells the fruit bagged and cut into pieces.
She currently needs to buy fruit: mangoes, watermelon, jcama and cucumber because she doesnt have a lot of fruit available in her stand. This loan will be of great help to her because shell be able to offer fresh fruit to her customers.
For Mara, her only goal is to have a source of income that will allow her to cover household needs and, above all, keep her children in optimal conditions so that they can improve themselves.

loan.use: to buy fruit.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy onions, tomatoes, potatoes, cauliflower and cabbage, as well as apples and papayas.

loan.name: Maria Yolanda

texts.es: Mara, vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 17 y 4 aos de edad, ella tiene un negocio de pupusas y artculos de primera necesidad, est ubicado en su casa de habitacin, no tiene un horario de trabajo y lo administra desde hace 18 meses. Actualmente Mara necesita comprar mercadera para el negocio, por lo que solicita un prstamo para adquirir aceite, azcar, embutidos, golosinas, gaseosas y jabn, esto surge por la necesidad de fortalecer el negocio y ofrecer a los clientes lo ms necesario en los hogares. Para Mara el objetivo es contribuir al desarrollo de sus hijos, a travs del esfuerzo que realiza cada da en su negocio.
texts.en:
Mara lives with her husband and two children who are 17 and 4 years old. She sells pupusas (typical Salvadoran fast food) and basic need items at home. She does not have a fixed work schedule and shes been running the business for the last 18 months.
Currently, Mara needs to buy merchandise for the business so is asking for a loan to buy oil, sugar, cured meats, snacks, soft drinks and soap. This arises because of the need to strengthen the business and offer customers what they most need in their homes.
For Mara, the goal is to contribute to her childrens development through the daily effort she puts into her business.

loan.use: to buy oil, sugar, cured meats, snacks, soft drinks and soap.

loan.name: Reynaldo

texts.es: Reynaldo, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 25 y 20 aos de edad, l tiene 11 aos de trabajar en su propio taller de reparacin de bicicletas, con este negocio ha logrado cubrir las necesidades del hogar. l solicita un prstamo para la compra de repuestos, pues quiere fortalecer el inventario de su taller comprando pedales, asientos, forros, frenos, rayos, entre otros, que son parte de las bicicletas y que los clientes tienen la necesidad de reparar. Las aspiraciones de Reynaldo es primeramente ver que sus hijos estn en buenas condiciones, proveer para su hogar todo lo necesario y que su negocio sea cada da ms rentable.
texts.en:
Reynaldo lives with his wife and two children who are 25 and 20 years of age. Hes been working for 11 years in his own bicycle repair shop. This business has allowed him to cover household needs.
He is asking for a loan to buy spare parts because he wants to strengthen his shops inventory buying pedals, seats, covers, brakes and spokes, among others, which are bicycle parts that the customers need to have repaired.
Reynaldos goals are first to see that his children are in good state, to provide for his entire homes needs and that his business is more profitable every day.

loan.use: to buy pedals, seats, covers, brakes and spokes.

loan.name: Clara Maribel

texts.es: Clara, vive con su madre y dos hijos de 9 y 7 aos de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de meriendas y tortillas, tiene varios aos de estar dedicada al negocio, y es la fuente de ingreso con la que cuenta para cubrir las necesidades del hogar. Clara solicita un prstamo para la compra ingredientes para preparar las meriendas, como pollo, carnes rojas, verduras, condimentos y maz para las tortillas, con este prstamo solventara la necesidad de materiales para preparar las comidas diariamente. El objetivo de ella es que como Madre, ver a sus hijas formados acadmicamente, poderle financiar sus estudios para que puedan superarse.
texts.en:
Clara lives with her mother and two children who are 9 and 7 years of age. She sells prepared meals and tortillas. Shes been in this business for several years and it is the source of income she relies on to cover household needs.
Clara is asking for a loan to buy ingredients for her meal preparation like: chicken, red meats, vegetables, condiments and corn to make tortillas. With this loan she will cover the need for supplies used in daily meal preparation.
Her goal as a mother is to see her children academically prepared, to be able to pay for their schooling so that they can do well in life.

loan.use: buy chicken, red meats, vegetables, condiments and corn to make tortillas.

loan.name: Cruz De Espinas Group

texts.es: Yaneth Felicia tiene 27 aos de edad socia de la alcanca comunal Cruz de Espinas, es madre soltera su hijo de 4 aos de edad, vive en la localidad de Matahuasi Huancayo, Yaneth desde muy pequea quedaron hurfanos con su hermano Csar conflicto del Terror del Terrorismo en Per en los aos 90, desde entonces de su niez tuvieron que trabajar cuidando ganado ajeno de los vecinos de la zona, trabajaron y se esforzaron mucho y actualmente ya tienen sus propios ganados y desean incrementar para engorde. El Prstamo que solicita es para la compra de Alimentos Balanceados para sus ganados vacunos. La socia esta en la segunda fila la cuarta persona lado derecha con chompa color morado. El Prstamo es de s/. 500.00 Nuevos Soles
texts.en:
Yaneth Felicia is 27 years old and a member of the Cruz de Espinas (Cross of Thorns) communal bank. She is a single mother of a 4-year-old son. She lives in Matahuasi, Huancayo.
Yaneth and her brother Csar were orphaned while still very little due to the rampant terrorism in Per in the 90s. Since their childhood they had to work caring for cattle belonging to nearby neighbors. They worked hard and put much effort into their work and they currently own cattle of their own. They want to increase the size of their herd to raise and fatten up. The loan shes asking for is to buy nutritionally balanced cattle feed.
She appears in the second row, fourth person on the right wearing a purple sweater.
The loan is for 500 new soles.

loan.use: to buy nutritionally balanced cattle feed.

loan.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: Jos, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, vive con su familia, y tiene 6 aos de estar dedicndose a la crianza y comercio de cerdos, con este negocio este cubriendo todas las necesidades de su hogar. l solicita un prstamo para la compra de concentrado y vacunas, con esta ayuda podr velar por la salud de los cerdos y darles una buena alimentacin, con la esperanza que le d un mejor resultado la granja al comercializar los cerdos. Su aspiracin es crecer en el negocio, tener un buen nmero de cerdos en la granja y velar por todas sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Jos lives with his family and has worked raising and selling pigs for six years. He covers all of the household needs with this business. He is requesting a loan for the purchase of concentrated feed and vaccines and with this support, he will be able to watch over his pigs health and provide them with a good diet. As a result, he hopes that the pigs on his farm sell better.

His dream is for his business to grow, to have a good number of pigs on the farm, and to look out for their needs.

loan.use: to buy concentrated feed and vaccines for his pigs.

loan.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es: Mara, es madre de familia, vive con dos hijos, es comerciante desde hace 30 aos, se dedica a la venta de frutas, verduras y queso, tiene muchos aos de estar en el negocio, lo aprendi por su familia la cual es comerciante. Ella necesita un prstamo para la compra de verduras: zanahorias, papas, tomates, chiles, tambin fresas, uvas, bananos y naranjas, para fortalecer el negocio, esta idea es para ofrecer a los clientes una diversidad de frutos frescos, mejorando la condicin del negocio. Su aspiracin es fortalecer el negocio, aumentar el comercio, con la esperanza de crecer cada da y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Mara is a mother and lives with her two children. She has been a merchant for 30 years and works sells fruit, vegetables and cheese. She has been in this business for a long time and learned the trade from her family, who are merchants.

She needs a loan for the purchase of vegetables like carrots, potatoes, tomatoes, and hot peppers, as well as fruits like strawberries, grapes, bananas and oranges in order to strengthen her business. The idea is to have a variety of fresh fruits to sell in order to improve the business.

Her dream is to strengthen her business and expand sales with the hope of growing on a daily basis and thus improving her familys living conditions.

loan.use: to buy carrots, potatoes, tomatoes, hot peppers, strawberries, grapes and bananas.

loan.name: Maria Ysabel

texts.es:
Maria es una madre de familia de 28 aos de edad, actualmente ella vive con sus 2 hijos menores de edad, ella vive en una zona rural del distrito del distrito de catacaos en el departamento de Piura.
Maria se dedica a la comercializacin de animales menores, aves de corral en variedad y adems de ovejas, los cuales cra en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, este negocio lo desarrolla en el mercado de Piura y tambin realiza entregas en su domicilio. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace mas de 10 aos, en los que a adquirido experiencia en el rubro y clientela fija a su negocio.
Maria est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para poder comprar animales con su respectivo alimento balanceado. Adems ella desea realizar unas mejoras en sus corrales, para mejorar el ambiente en donde cra a sus animales.
Maria desea mejorar su calidad de vida, con esfuerzo y trabajo. Cuenta con buenas referencias laborales, las personas que la conocen la describen como una persona tranquila y responsable.
texts.en:
Maria is a 28 year-old mother who currently lives with her two young children. She lives in a rural area in the Catacaos district in the department of Piura.
Maria's occupation is the business of small animals, various poultry and also sheep, which she raises in pens located in the back of her home. This business sells in the market at Piura and also makes home deliveries. She has been working in this business for more than 10 years, during which time she acquired experience in the field and established a customer base for her business.
Maria is requesting a loan through Edpyme Alternativa of 1,500 New Soles to be able to buy animals along with with their respective animal feed. In addition, she wants to make improvements to their pens to improve the environment in which she raises her animals.
Maria wants to improve her quality of life with effort and hard work. She has good work references, and people who know her describe her as a calm and responsible person.

loan.use: to buy animals together with their respective animal feed.

loan.name: Maria Ermelinda

texts.es: Mara, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, se dedica a la venta D. sopa D. puya, chilate y tamales, este negocio lo realiza en su propia casa, ofreciendo a sus amigos y vecinos, el negocio lo realiza desD. hace 12 aos. Ella necesita un prstamo e invertirlo en materiales para la preparacin D. la venta como por ejemplo, verduras, condimentos, maz, pollo, aceite, con esta compra mejorara la calidad D. su negocio, manteniendo todo lo necesario para continuar produciendo y vendiendo alimentos. Lo que Mara espera es que su negocio aumente, sea ms rentable para ayudar D. una mejor manera a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mara lives with her husband and two children and works selling tripe soup, chilate (a Central American drink maD. from peppers, corn and cocoa) and tamales. She works from her house, selling to her friends and neighbors, and has been in this business for 12 years.

She needs a loan to invest in materials for preparing the food to sell, such as vegetables, condiments, corn, chicken and oil. She will improve the quality of her business with this purchase, having everything necessary to continue making and selling food.

Mara hopes that her business will increase and will be more profitable so that she can better help her children.

loan.use: to buy vegetables, condiments, corn, chicken and oil.

loan.name: Magaly

texts.es:
Magaly tiene 26 aos de edad, ella vive con sus esposo,cuenta con casa propia, su vivienda est ubicada en un casero llamado Sinchi Roca, en el distrito de Tambogrande, este casero cuenta con los servicios bsicos (agua y desage)y con grandes deseos de superacin.
Magaly cuenta con una bodega instalada en sus domicilio donde ofrece todo tipo de bebidas, la venta de cerveza es la que ms salida tiene los fines de semana y adems trabaja en la Municipalidad de Sinchi Roca, su esposo es agricultor y lo apoya en las actividades que realiza, existe una buena relacin familiar.
Magaly est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para que pueda comprar ms cerveza y realizar unas mejoras en el local para brindar una mejor atencin a su pblico y seguir creciendo en su actividad.
Magaly cuenta con muy buenas referencias, sus vecinos y amigos la consideran una mujer muy joven trabajadora y responsable.
texts.en: Magaly is 26 years old. She lives with her husband and has her own house. Her home is located in a village called Sinchi Roca in the district of Tambogrande. This village has basic services (water and sewage) and a great desire to excel. Magaly has a store that she runs from her home where she offers all types of drinks. The beer sales are the greatest. She has the weekends and also work for the Sinchi Roca municipality. Her husband is a farmer and she helps him with his work. They have a good relationship. Magaly is requesting a loan of $750 from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more beer and to make some improvements to her premises in order to give better service to her customers and to keep growing her business. Magaly has good references. Her neighbors and friends consider her to be a very hardworking and responsible young woman.

loan.use: to buy more beer and make some improvements to her premises.

loan.name: Sandra Yaneth

texts.es:
Sandra, vive con su esposo y un hijo, ella venD. poleada y en donD. vive realiza costuras, ella sale a vender a las calles D. la ciudad D. las 7:00am en delante, tambin en sus momentos realiza costuras.
Actualmente necesita un prstamo para la compra D. ollas para el negocio y reparacin del carretn donD. venD. las poleadas, con esta ayuda mejorara su actividad ya que con ollas nuevas podr aumentar la produccin y mejorar la calidad.
El objetivo D. ella es construir su propia casa ya que actualmente est pagando cuotas D. un lote, donD. piensa en un futuro construir la vivienda.
texts.en:
Sandra lives with her husband and son and works selling poleada (vanilla custard) and also sews at her house. She goes out to the city streets to sell starting at 7am and she also sews in her spare time.
She currently needs a loan to buy pots for her business and to repair the cart from which she sells the poleadas. With this support, she will improve her business as the new pots will help her to increase production and improve the quality of her food.
Her goal is to build her own house, as she is currently making payments for a lot where she plans to build it in the future.

loan.use: to buy pots for her business and to repair the cart she uses to sell custard.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy wood, glue and formica.

loan.name: San Isidro Group

texts.es: La seora Kattyusca Roci es socia de la alcancia comunal san isidro, tiene 30 aos de edad vive en huari Huancayo Per, tiene 2 hijos menores, Mery de 6 aos y Yermy de 1 ao, la socia siempre se dedic a la confeccion de peluches artesanales, elaboradas con lanas y tejidos, su madre quien la ense a confeccionarlos y con el apoyo de su esposo Juan quien tambin lo ayuda a elaborar las lanas a hilos para los tejidos. y asi venden los peluches artezanales en las ferias dominicales,la socia logra mantener el hogar con sua ahorros, su esposo se dedica exclusivamente a la venta de condimentos. El Prstamo es para la compra de pellejos (piel de anmales) para la produccin de peluches Artesanales.La socia esta en la primera fila derecha con chompra rojo cuvierta con una tela artezanal hecha a tejidos coloridos y elegantes. El Prstamo es de s/. 600.00 Nuevo Soles
texts.en:
Kattyusca Roco is a member of the San Isidro communal bank. Shes 30 years old and lives in Huari, Huancayo, Per. She has two minor children: Mery, 6 and Yermy, 1.
She has always made artisanal stuffed toys from wool and fabric. Her mother taught her how to make them and her husband, Juan, helps her too to change the yarn into fabric. They sell their artisanal stuffed toys at the Sunday farmers markets. She is able to support her home with her savings. Her husband sells condiments exclusively. The loan is to buy animal pelts to use in the artisanal stuffed toy making.
She is in the first row on the right wearing a red sweater covered with colorful and elegant artisanal fabric.
The loan is for 600 new soles.

loan.use: to make stuffed toys.

loan.name: Rufino

texts.es: Rufino, es soltero, vive junto a sus padres y una sobrina, l se dedica al cultivo de maz y frijol, a parte de este oficio es empleado de un comercial reconocido de motocicletas, normalmente para la poca de invierno cultiva siempre. Hoy da se encuentra iniciando el proceso de cultivo, por lo que solicita un prstamo para la compra abono y fertilizantes, esta compra le ayudara para tener todos los materiales necesarios e iniciar el cultivo. Su objetivo es crecer en los cultivos, para ayudar a sus padres en los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Rufino is single and lives with his parents and a niece. He works growing corn and beans, but he is also employed by a renowned motorcycle company. Normally, he always farms during the winter months.

He is now beginning the farming process, which is why he is requesting a loan to buy manure and fertilizers. This purchase will help him to have all the necessary materials and to begin farming.

His goal is for his farming business to grow so that he can help his parents with the household expenses.

loan.use: to buy manure and fertilizers.

loan.name: Nueva Gloria Group

texts.en:
America is the group coordinator of her group, Nueva Gloria 1 & 2. This group has 10 members. The group is based in Los Alcarrizos, a dusty industrial town.
America runs a small business of selling cosmetics. She dedicates herself to selling hand and face creams, make-up, body lotion, and many other cosmetics. A friend told her about a very famous franchise for cosmetics and natural products, and she decided to sell those products. America is really excited to develop this business, which she will start with her first Esperanza loan. She wishes to repay her loan well and to continue receiving more loans. She is excited to receive her first loan with Esperanza. She wants to use her business profits to increase her inventory.
America has 4 children. Three of them live together in her simple house with their father. Her dreams are to have an improved and successful business, and also to build a house for her children. Her favorite things to do are to read and sew.

loan.use: to buy toothpaste, soap, hand and body lotion, and other cosmetics

loan.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio tiene 46 aos de edad, el es soltero, vive en un casero llamado nuevo Anexo San Juan, del distrito de Mrrope a 40 minutos de la ciudad de chiclayo.
Se dedica ala comercializacin de animales especialmente a la ganado ovino (ovejas), ganado caprino (cabritos) y caballos, los cuales cra en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, este negocio lo desarrolla en el mercado de Lambayeque y tambin realiza entregas en su domicilio. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace muchos aos, en los que a adquirido experiencia en el rubro y clientela fija a su negocio.
Julio est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para poder comprar animales con su respectivo alimento balanceado. Adems ella desea realizar unas mejoras en sus corrales, para mejorar el ambiente en donde cra a sus animales.
Julio desea mejorar su calidad de vida, con esfuerzo y trabajo. Cuenta con buenas referencias, las personas que lo conocen lo describen como una persona tranquila y responsable.
texts.en: Julio is 46 years old and single. He lives in a village called Nuevo Anexo San Juan in the district of Mrrope, 40 minutes from the city of Chiclayo. He works selling animals, especially sheep, goats, and horses, which he keeps in corrals behind his house. He sells his animals in the market at Lambayeque and he also delivers to people's homes. He has been doing this work for many years and has acquired a lot of experiences and has a loyal customer base. Julio is requesting a $750 loan from Edpyme Alternativa to buy animals and their appropriate food. He also wants to make some improvements to his corrals to improve the environment in which his animals are raised. Julio wants to improve his quality of life with his hard work and efforts. He has good references and the people who know him describe him as a calm and responsible person.

loan.use: to buy more animals and their food, and to make improvements to his corrals.

loan.name: Brayan Josue

texts.es: Brayan, es empleado y comercializa ropa, vive con su esposa y una hija de 6 aos, l trabaja todos los das de 2:00pm en delante en una funeraria, el dems tiempo lo dedica a vender ropa. Actualmente necesita invertir en mercadera, comprando prendas de vestir casual, femenina y para nios, con esta inversin est en mejores condiciones para ofrecer a los clientes. Su objetivo es tener una fuente de ingreso constante para ayudar a su joven familia, e ir progresando juntos para alcanza una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Brayan is employed and he also sells clothing. He lives with his wife and 6-year-old daughter and works everyday starting at 2:00pm at a funeral parlor. He spends the rest of his time selling clothing.

He currently needs to invest in merchandise, buying casual wear as well as womens and childrens clothing. With this investment, he will be in a better condition to sell to his customers.

His goal is to have a constant source of income to support his young family and to continue moving forward together to achieve a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy casual wear and women's and children's clothing.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy supplies for her crops.

loan.name: Jose Orlando

texts.es:
Jos tiene 36 aos de edad, el es casado y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad. Vive en casa propia la cual esta ubicada e una comunidad pequea del distrito de Chepen.
Jos se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte pblico en una mototaxi (moto con cabina para transportar personas) que es su propiedad durante la semana de lunes a viernes y los fines de semana se dedica la venta de verduras en el mercado de su localidad. Su esposa lo ayuda al sostenimiento del hogar con la venta de comida, actividad a la a que se dedica hace 8 aos.
Jos est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles para poder realizar un mantenimiento a su unidad mvil, con sus respectivas actualizaciones de documentos y para comprar ms mercadera para su negocio de verduras.
texts.en:
Jos is 36 years old, and is married with two young children. He lives in his own house which is located in a small community in Chepn district.
During the week, from Monday to Friday, Jos works providing public transport with a mototaxi (a motorcycle with a cab for transporting people), which is his property. Weekends are spent selling vegetables at the market in his area. His wife helps him with the household by selling food, an activity that she has been working in for 8 years.
Jos is requesting a loan through Alternative Edpyme of 2,500 New Soles to perform maintenance on his mototaxi, with the relevant updated documents, and to buy more merchandise for his vegetable business.

loan.use: to maintain his mototaxi.

loan.name: Melida

texts.es: Melida, se dedica a la venta de hot dog, vive con su esposo y un hijo de 16 aos, ella aprendi a preparar la venta junto a su esposo desde hace 11 aos, recorren varias calles ofreciendo la venta desde las 8:00am a 5:30 pm. Ella solicita un prstamo para la compra de materiales, repollo, aderezos, salchichas, jamn, servilletas y polipel, con esta compra espera producir ms. Su objetivo es crecer en las ventas, pagar las deudas y velar por su familia.
texts.en:
Melida lives with her husband and 16-year-old son and works selling hot dogs. She learned to prepare them to sell with her husband eleven years ago and they travel to various streets selling from 8am to 5:30pm.
She is requesting a loan for the purchase of materials like cabbage, seasonings, hot dogs, ham, napkins and bags. She hopes to produce more with this purchase.
Her goal is to grow in sales, pay off her debts and watch over her family.

loan.use: to buy cabbage, seasonings, hot dogs, ham, napkins and bags.

loan.name: Blanca Rosa

texts.es:
Blanca tiene 48 aos de edad, ella tiene 2 hijas mayores de edad, actualmente no cuenta con carga familiar directa, blanca con casa propia la cual est ubicada en una zona rural del distrito de Chiclayo.
Blanca Ella cuenta con una pequea bodega instalada en su domicilio la cual es atendida por ella misma, hace 3 aos. All ofrece en venta a sus vecinos y clientes de la zona diversos productos de consumo diario, entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes, haci como tambin bebidas, el negacin tiene buena cogida y en este tiempo a conseguido tener clientela fija.
Blanca est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para que pueda acondicionar un espacio de sus casa solo para la venta de cerveza, cuales tienen muy buen nivel de ventas los fines de semanas.
Blanca es una mujer bastante trabajadora y de muy buen carcter, las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cario.
texts.en:
Blanca, age 48, has two grown children. She does not currently have any dependent relatives. Blanca has her own house, which is located in a rural area in the Chiclayo district.
Blanca has a small general store set up in her house. She has been taking care of it herself for three years. She sells to her neighbors and customers in the area. She sells diverse daily consumption products, basic needs products, and groceries. She also sells drinks. The business is well received, and she has managed to get regular customers.
Blanca is requesting a loan for 1,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa. She will use the loan to set up a space in her house solely for the sale of beer. There is a good level of beer sales on the week-ends.
Blanca is a very hard-working woman and is of good moral character. The people who know her hold her in high esteem and are fond of her.

loan.use: to fix up a space in her business in order to sell beer.

loan.name: Maria Emilse

texts.es:
Maria tiene 33 aos de edad, ella vive con su esposo y sus 05 hijos menores de edad. Cuenta con casa propia la cual est ubicada en el Casero Charan Coposo en el distrito de Tambogrande en Piura. Maria vive en la parte rural del distrito, pero cuenta con servicio de luz.
Maria se dedica a la comercializacin de animales menores, aves de corral en variedad y adems de ovejas, los cuales cra en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, los cuales son muy espaciosos.
Este negocio lo desarrolla en el mercado de Piura, esta actividad la realiza desde hace ms de 6 aos, en los que a adquirido experiencia en el rubro y clientela fija a su negocio. Tambin se dedica a la agricultura, junto a su esposo trabajan su parcela que han heredado de sus padres, en dicha parcela cuenta con limn el cual lo cosechan semanalmente.
Maria est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para poder comprar animales con su respectivo alimento balanceado.
Maria desea mejorar su calidad de vida, con esfuerzo y trabajo. Cuenta con buenas referencias laborales, las personas que la conocen la describen como una persona tranquila y responsable.
texts.en:
Mara, age 33, lives with her husband and their five minor children. She has her own house in Charan Coposo, a rural community in the Tambogrande district in Piura. Even though Mara lives in the rural part of the district, she does have electricity.
Mara sells small farm animals, a variety of poultry, and sheep. She raises them in pens, which are very spacious, behind her home. She carries out her business at the Piura market. She has been doing this for over six years. She has acquired experience in the field, and she has a fixed customer base in her business.
She also devotes herself to agriculture. Together with her husband, she works the plot of land that they inherited from their parents. This plot has lemons, which they harvest weekly.
Mara is requesting a loan for 1,5000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa. She will be able to buy animals and balanced feed with the loan.
Mara wishes to improve her quality of life through effort and work. She has good work references. The people who know her describe her as a calm and responsible person.

loan.use: to buy animals and balanced feed.

loan.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
Gregorio tiene de 65 aos de edad, el es casado, vive con sus esposa y tiene 7 hijos de los cuales solo 2 estn a su cargo. Gregorio cuenta con casa propia la cual est ubicada en el distrito de Reque a 15 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.
Gregorio se dedica a la elaboracin de adobes y ladrillos, los cuales estn hechos a base de barro con pajilla, estos materiales son utilizados para la elaboracin de casas o diferentes ambientes de estructura rustica, Gregorio los elabora y posteriormente los vende por millares o cientos, en algunas ocasiones elabora sus productos de acuerdo a pedidos. Esta actividad la realiza hace ms de 20 aos en los que a obtenido experiencia en el rubro y en los que a conseguido clientela fija para sus negocio.
Gregorio est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de nuevos soles para que pueda comprar 3 camionada de pajilla, y de esta manera pueda realizar una mayor cantidad de adobes
Gregorio es un padre entregado a su trabajo muy responsable, y honesto, su ms grande anhelo es poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gregorio, age 65, is married and lives with his wife. He has seven children, but only two are under his care. Gregorio has his own house, which is located in the Reque district 15 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.
Gregorio makes sun-dried bricks and fired bricks. They are made from a base of mud with straw. These materials are used to build houses or different structures made from simple, rustic materials. Gregorio makes them and later sells them by the thousands or hundreds. Sometimes he makes his products according to orders. He has been doing this for over 20 years. During that time he has gained experience in the field, and he has gotten a customer base for his business.
Gregorio is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternative for 1,300 soles. He will use the loan to buy three truckloads of straw. That way he will be able to make a greater quantity of bricks.
Gregorio is a father who is dedicated to his work. He is very responsible and honest. His greatest desire is to be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy supplies to make bricks.

loan.name: Isidora

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY TIKA; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Isidora; ella tiene 30 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida, ella prepara diferentes platos, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m en el mercado del distrito de Urubamba, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de comida. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carne, pollo y verduras.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the Munay Tika Communal Bank. It is located in the District of Urubamba, which is part of the Province of Urubamba and the Department of Cusco.

Isadora is 30 years old, has a live-in partner and two children. She alternates her daily activities with her food sales business where she prepares different dishes. She works from 8am to 4pm at the market in the District of Urubamba. She wants to expand and improve her food sales business and is requesting a loan to buy products to cook such as meat, chicken and vegetables.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make her loan payments.

loan.use: to buy products to cook such as meat, chicken and vegetables.

loan.name: Mereyda

texts.es:
Mereyda tiene 49 aos de edad, ella es soltera y tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad. Ella cuenta con casa propia la cual est ubicada en el casero llamado Corral de arena en el distrito de Olmos. Mereyda vive en la parte rural de este distrito, pero aun haci cuenta con los servicios bsicos (agua y luz).
Mereyda se dedica a la comercializacin de animales menores, aves de corral en variedad y adems de ovejas, los cuales cra en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, esta actividad la aprendi de sus padre y desde hace 5 aos ella a realiza sus ventas en el mercado de Piura y tambin realiza entregas en su domicilio. En todos estos aos mereyda ha adquirido experiencia en el rubro y clientela fija a su negocio.
Mereyda est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para poder comprar animales con su respectivo alimento balanceado. Adems ella desea realizar unas mejoras en sus corrales, para mejorar el ambiente en donde cra a sus animales.
Mereyda desea mejorar su calidad de vida, con esfuerzo y trabajo. Cuenta con buenas referencias laborales, las personas que la conocen la describen como una persona tranquila y responsable.
texts.en:
Mereyda is 49 years old, she is single and has 2 adult children. She has her own house which is located in the hamlet called Corral de Arena in the Olmos district. Mereyda lives in the rural part of this district, but she still has basic services (water and electricity).
Mereyda works in the business of small animals, various poultry and also sheep, which she raises in pens located behind her home. She learned this activity from her father. 5 years ago she started selling at the market in Piura and she also makes home deliveries. In all these years, Mereyda has gained experience and established a client base for her business.
Mereyda is requesting a loan of 1,000 New Soles through Edpyme Alternativa to be able to buy animals together with their respective animal feed. In addition she wants to make improvements to their pens, to improve the environment in which she is raising her animals.
Mereyda want to improve her quality of life with effort and hard work. She has good work references, and people who know her describe her as a calm and responsible woman.

loan.use: to buy animals with their respective animal feed.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: improve and install a roof for his house.

loan.name: Eva

texts.es: Eva tiene 47 aos, vive con 2 de sus 4 hijos en su casa que es propia. Casi toda su vida ha estado ligada a las actividades agrcolas, pero hace 16 aos empez con la ganadera, ya que las vacas que posee le proporcionan gran cantidad de leche, que los lleva a vender a una fbrica de lcteos, que se encuentra cerca de su vivienda. Es as que sus vacas producen 60 litros leche diariamente, y por tal recibe buena cantidad de dinero. Por otro lado, vende tambin los becerros machos, as se genera ms ingresos. En ocasiones sus hijos la apoyan en esta actividad, asimismo la apoyan en la siembra de papa y maz, pero lo hacen en menos extensiones de terreno, pues lo cosechado es utilizado para su consumo propio. Eva sabe lo rentable que le ha resultado la venta de leche, por ello desea su ayuda con un pequeo prstamo para pueda ampliar su establo y mejorar su infraestructura. Este ser su crdito nmero 3 con MFP, por tanto espera de su apoyo para que pueda cumplir sus objetivos, asimismo asegura que ser muy responsable en sus cuotas. Con el crdito que solicita, lo invertir en la compra de remedios para sus vacas y tambin semilla de pastizales para sembrar en sus terrenos y tener forraje para alimentar a sus vacas.
texts.en:
Eva is 47 years old and lives with two of her four children in a house she owns. She has been farming almost all her life, but also ventured into the livestock business 16 years ago when she began selling excess milk produced by her cows to a local dairy. Her cows produce 60 liters of milk a day, which generates a lot of income. She also earns revenue from the sale of male calves.
Occasionally, Eva's children help her with her livestock business and farm. They grow potato and maize, but mostly for the family's consumption. Most of the land is dedicated to the dairy business because it is more profitable. She is applying for a small loan to expand and improve her stables.
This will be Eva's third loan from MFP and she hopes to again receive the institution's financing. She is able to meet all requirements and will responsibly repay the loan. With the loan capital, Eva will buy medication for her dairy cows as well as grass seed to cultivate pasture land for grazing.

loan.use: To buy medicine for her cows as well as grass seed to plant a pasture for grazing.

loan.name: Denis De Los Angeles

texts.es: Denis pequeo comerciante, se dedica a la elaboracin de persianas de vidrio y metal, venta de ropa, con ms de cinco aos, trabajando en su negocio propio. Desde joven aprendi el oficio, lo que trabajaba en una fbrica. Atreves de ahorro y prstamo logra comprar herramientas para comenzar hacer su trabajo propio. As como mejora a su vivienda, en donde se le ha hecho posible mediantes estos financiamiento. Con este nuevo prstamo comprara: aluminio, vidrio, y otros materiales para hacer ventana y seguir cumpliendo con su demanda, as como sus compromisos con la familia, y otros gastos.
texts.en:
Denis, a small businessman, makes window blinds from glass and metal, and he sells clothing. He has been working in his own business for more than five years. He learned this trade as a youth, when he worked in a factory. Through his savings and a loan he managed to buy tools to begin doing his own work.
In addition, he is improving his house, which has been made possible through these loans.
With this new loan he will buy aluminum, glass, and other materials to make windows and continue filling his orders. He will also fulfull his obligations to his family and pay for other expenses.

loan.use: to buy glass and aluminum to continue filling his orders for window blinds.

loan.name: Rufina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY TIKA; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Rufina; ella tiene 44 aos de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de fruta al por mayor, ella vende manzanas, naranjas, pltanos, uvas y mandarinas y lo distribuye en los diferentes mercados del distrito de Urubamba, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de fruta. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar frutas al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This communal bank member belongs to the communal bank "Munay Tika." The bank is located in the district of Urubamba, which belongs to the Urubamba province and the department of Cusco.
She is Sra. Rufina. She is 44 years old and is married with four children. She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling fruit wholesale. She sells apples, oranges, bananas, grapes, and mandarins, and she distributes them in different markets in the district of Urubamba. Through this business, she is raising her family. She wants to expand her fruit-selling business. She is applying for the loan to buy more fruit wholesale.
This bank member is happy to have the loan and she promises to make the payments.

loan.use: to buy more fruit wholesale.

loan.name: Vilma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY TIKA; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Vilma; ella tiene 34 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azcar, aceite y leche, la socia trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar la tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar productos como arroz, aceite, leche y golosinas.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This communal bank member belongs to the communal bank "Munay Tika." The bank is located in the Urubamba district, which belongs to the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.
She is Sra. Vilma. She is 34 years old, is in a common-law marriage, and has three children. She alternates her daily activities with her grocery store business. She sells basic products such as rice, sugar, oil, and milk. She works from 7 am to 8 pm. Through her business, she is raising her children. She wants to expand and improve her grocery story. She is applying for the loan to buy products such as rice, oil, milk, and sweets.
She is happy to have the loan and promises to make her payments.

loan.use: to buy products such as rice, oil, milk, and sweets

loan.name: Reluz Miope Paulita

texts.es:
Paulina tiene 55 aos de edad, vive con su esposo y 02 hijas que estn en edad escolar. Su vivienda est ubicada en un casero llamado valle hermoso en el distrito de Monsef, que es una pequea comunidad rural que est ubicada a 40 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Esta zona se caracteriza por dedicarse a la agricultura y ganadera.
Paulina desde hace 20 aos se dedica ala crianza de ganado vacuno, labor que le permite obtener ingresos de la venta de leche, la cual realiza en sus comunidad u en zonas cercanas a su comunidad. Tambin se dedica a la artesana (elaboracin de sombreros de paja y palma), de la cual tambin percibe pequeos ingresos Estas actividades le permiten solventar algunos gastos diarios del hogar, ya que lo que gana su esposo como pen agrcola no es suficiente, para cubrir los gastos familiares.
Los pastos para alimentacin de ganado han escaseado por lo que se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar un crdito a Edpyme Alternativa de S/.1000 nuevos soles, dinero que invertir en la compra de alfalfa y alimento balanceado para su ganado y por consiguiente una mayor produccin de leche.
Su ms grande sueo es darles a sus hijas una educacin de calidad, Paulina es una madre de familia muy trabajadora y responsable, cuenta con muy buenas referencias por parte de sus amigos y vecinos.
texts.en:
Paulina is 55 years old, and lives with her husband and 2 school-age daughters.
Her house is located in a village called Valle Hermoso (Beautiful Valley) in the Monsef district. It is a small rural community that is located 40 minutes from the city of Chiclayo. This area is characterized by agriculture and livestock breeding.
Paulina has been raising dairy cattle for 20 years. This work allows her to earn income from the sale of milk, which she sells in her community or in areas close to her community. She also works in handicrafts (making sombreros from straw and palm), from which she also earns a small income. These activities allow her to manage some of the daily household expenses, as what her husband earns as an agricultural laborer is not enough to cover the family expenses.
Pastures for feeding the cattle have been scarce, which is why she has seen it necessary to apply for a loan through Edpyme Alternativea for 1,000 New Soles. The money will be invested in the purchase of alfalfa and balanced feed for her livestock, therefore resulting in increased milk production.
Her biggest dream is to give her daughters a quality education. Paulina is a hardworking and responsible mother, who has good references from her friends and neighbors.

loan.use: to buy feed for her animals and materials for making her products.

loan.name: Susana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY TIKA; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Susana; ella tiene 40 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de frutas, ella lo distribuye a todos los mercados del distrito de Urubamba, la fruta lo trae del distrito de Calca, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de fruta. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar fruta como naranjas, pltanos, manzanas, uvas y mandarinas.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Susana is a member of the "Munay Tika" community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.
Susana is 40 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling fruit. She distributes her products to all the markets in Urubamba district and buys her fruit in Calca district. Through this business, she gets her children ahead in life. Susana would like to expand her fruit business. She is requesting this loan to buy fruit such as oranges, bananas, apples, grapes and mandarins.
Susana is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy fruit such as oranges, bananas, apples, grapes and mandarins

loan.name: Chabuca

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY TIKA; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Chabuca; ella tiene 24 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y tambin realiza el servicio de llamadas y la venta de recargas para celulares, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azcar y fideos y tambin para pagar las lneas de los celulares.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Chabuca is a member of the "Munay Tika" community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.
Chabuca is 24 years old, lives with her partner, and has one child. She divides her time between her daily activities and her grocery store business. She also provides a call service and sells top-ups (minutes) for cell phones. She works from 6.00am to 5.00pm and, through her business, she gets her children ahead in life. Chabuca would like to expand her grocery store business. She is requesting this loan to buy products for her grocery store such as rice, sugar and noodles. She will also pay for cell phone lines.
Chabuca is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy products for her grocery store such as rice, sugar and noodles, and to pay for cell phone lines

loan.name: Emiliano

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY TIKA; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Emiliano; el tiene 45 aos de edad y es casado y tiene 4 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo de construccin, el realiza diferentes trabajos de construccin como casas y edificios, por medio de este trabajo el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere mejorar el trabajo de construccin y tambin quiere terminar de construir su casa. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar materiales de construccin como fierros, bloquetas y cementos.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Emiliano is a member of the "Munay Tika" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.
Emiliano is 45 years old, married, and has four children. He divides his time between his daily activities and his building work. He works on different construction jobs such as houses and buildings. Through this work, he gets his children ahead in life. Emiliano would like to improve the construction work that he does and would also like to finish building his own house.
Emiliano is requesting this loan to buy construction supplies such as iron, blocks and cement. He is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loan.use: to buy construction supplies such as iron, blocks and cement

loan.name: Elvira

texts.es:
Elvira D. 63 aos D. edad, es casada sin carga familiar, tiene casa propia, contando con los servicios D. agua y luz, ubicada en el distrito D. Chepn, la misma que pertenece al departamento D. la Libertad. Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura, ganadera y turismo.
La actividad que desarrolla Elvira es ha la venta D. todo tipo D. productos para el consumo diario D. las personas (arroz, leche, aceite, azcar, papel higinico, gaseosas, etc), en su propio domicilio desD. hace varios aos, al encontrarse su negocio en su casa pueD. atender a cualquier hora, lo que le permite diferenciarse D. otras tiendas y as pueda obtener ms ingresos para solventar sus gastos diarios.
El crdito solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es D. 2000 nuevos soles, el cual lo destinar para comprar mayor cantidad D. mercadera y poder ampliar su negocio con otros productos una vez que sus ventas aumenten. El sueo D. Elvira es tener ms adelante una tienda mayorita que le genere mayores ingresos para mejorar su calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Elvira is 63 years old, married, and does not have any dependents. She owns her own home which has water and electricity services and is located in Chepn district, in La Libertad department. The people in this area farm, raise livestock and work in tourism.
Elvira's business activity is selling all kinds of essential household products (rice, milk, oil, sugar, toilet paper, soda, etc). She makes her sales from her home and has been in this business for several years. As her business is located in her home, she is able to serve in it at any time which allows her to differentiate herself from other stores and she is thereby able to make more income with which to cover her daily expenses.
Elvira has requested a loan for 2,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa and she will use it to buy a larger quantity of merchandise and expand her business with other products once her sales increase. Elvira's dream for the future is to own a wholesale store which will make her more income and enable her to improve her quality of life.

loan.use: to buy more products to expand her business

loan.name: Clara

texts.es:
Clara de 54 aos de edad es una madre de familia que vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos, vive en casa propia, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz en el distrito de Mrrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque. Se caracteriza por ser una zona de mucha actividad agricola, ganadera y artesana.
Clara se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino (ovejas ) desde hace varios aos, su corral donde se encuentran sus ovejas est en la parte posterior de su casa. A sus animales los engorda con alimentos balanceados como con pastos naturales y una vez que tengan el peso y el tamao ptimo las ofrece en el mercado de la zona donde vive, con el dinero que va adquirir por sus ovejas podr atender las necesidades diarias de su hogar y familia. Su esposo se dedica a las labores agrcolas en sus tierras de cultivo con los que cuenta.
Ha solicitado un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimento balanceado para sus animales y de fertilizantes para sus tierras de cultivo. Con los ingresos que obtenga en ambas actividades podr pagar el crdito otorgado y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Clara es conocida en la zona por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia en especial la de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Clara is a 54 year-old mother who lives with her husband and two children. She lives in her own home, which has water and electricity, in Mrrope district, in Lambayeque department. This area is noted for the fact that many people farm, raise livestock and make handicrafts.
Clara has been raising sheep for several years and her sheep pen is located behind her home. She fattens her animals with balanced feed and natural pasture and, when they have achieved an optimum size and weight, she sells them in the market in her area. With the money that she makes for her sheep, she is able to take care of her family's daily needs. Her husband is a farmer who farms his own land.
Clara has requested a loan for 2,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed for her animals and fertilizers for her farm land. She will use the income that she makes from both businesses to repay her loan and improve her family's quality of life. Clara is known in her area for being a hard-working, responsible woman and she would like to improve her family's quality of life, especially that of her children.

loan.use: to buy balanced feed for her animals and fertilizers for her farm land

loan.name: Susana Del Pilar

texts.es:
Susana de 22 aos de edad, es soltera, vive con sus padres en su casa, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, que pertenece al departamento de Piura. Se cacteriza por que la actividad de los pobladores es la agricultura, ganadera y artesana.
Susana se dedica a la crianza y venta de aves de corral (pavos y gallinas), su corral que se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa para mayor seguridad de sus animales, los alimenta con comidad balanceada y granos naturales, una vez que han completado su desarrollo los vende a los distintos mercados de la zona donde vive. Adems cuenta con una pequea tienda en su casa donde ofrece diferentes productos a sus clientes.
Para poder incrementar sus ventas necesita un prstamo de 800 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para comprar alimentos balanceados para sus animales y para implementar su tienda con ms productos para seguir incrmentando sus ventas y as pueda ms adelante realizar algunos estudios superiores. Susana es una mujer responsable, trabajadora y empeosa conocida por los pobladores del lugar donde vive, por querer superarse en la vida y ayudar a sus padres econmicamente.
texts.en:
Susana is 22 years old and single. She lives with her parents in their home which is located in the rural area of Tambogrande district, in Piura department. This area is noted for the fact that its residents farm, raise livestock and make handicrafts.
Susana raises and sells poultry (turkeys and hens). Her pen is located behind her home in order to keep her animals safe. She feeds them balanced animal feed and natural grains. Once they have completed their development, she sells them at the different markets in her area. She also owns a small store in her home where she sells different products to her customers.
In order to increase her sales, Susana needs a loan for 800 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed for her animals and to stock her store with more products so that she can continue increasing her sales. This will enable her, in the future, to pursue a higher education. Susana is a responsible, hard-working and tenacious woman who is known by local residents for the fact that she wants to do well in life and help her parents financially.

loan.use: to buy balanced feed for her animals and to stock her store with products

loan.name: Maximina

texts.es:
Maximina es una madre de familia de 38 aos de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio slo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece aldepartamentode Piura. Los pobladores desarrollan la actividad agrcola, ganadera y artesana.
Desde hace 4 aos Maximina a colocado su picantera en donde vende platos hechos a base de pescados y mariscos en su propio domicilio, donde vende cerveza, es un producto que se vende ms los fines de semana. Con los ingresos que obtenga podr cubrir sus obligaciones familiares.
Al observar que su negocio va creciendo Maximina a credo conveniente solicitar un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para la compra de ms cerveza y as pueda obtenermayores ganacias con las ventas que realiza, lo que le permitir brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Maximina es una mujer emprenderora y muy trabajadora con el nico objetivo de sacar a su familia adelante.
texts.en:
Maximina is a 38 year old mother. She lives with her husband and children in her own house. She has electrical service. They live in a rural zone in the Tambogrande district, which is in the Piura departments. The population dedicates itself to agriculture, livestock, and handicrafts.
Four years ago Maximina set up her pub where she sells fish and seafood dishes in her own home. She sells beer there, which is a product that sells more on the week-ends. With the income she gets she will be able to cover the family obligations.
Upon observing that her business is growing, Maximina believes it advisable to request a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa. She will use the loan to buy more beer. This way she will be able to get more income from the sales that she makes. This will allow her to give her family a better quality of life.
Maximina is a very enterprising and hard-working woman whose only objective is to get her family ahead.

loan.use: to buy a greater quantity of beer.

loan.name: Filemon

texts.es: Filemn tiene 54 aos, vive con 2 de sus hijos en su casa propia. Hace ms de 15 aos se dedica a sembrar pastos, que es el alimento importante para su ganado asimismo siembra papa, arveja, zanahoria y papa.
